Bafia: Rìtumɛ̀n ɗi Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ à Yeesus Kiris Man à Bɛ̀ll.
Fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ki ri kìkànɛn ɓi kaàtà à ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan Ezayii lɛ: Ghɛna, ǹɗomi wɔ̀ mum Wɛm̀ à fìtom beèbɛ̀y, lɛ a pegsɛn wɔ̀ bee.
Jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ ìrì jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì roànɛ a làalamɓɛ̀n yì ɓi-reɓ lɛ: pègsɛɛna bee yi Kan ɓi rɛsàg yɔ lɛ saaɗ.
Nni Zyaŋ à peeghày ɓi-reɓ, à ɓààɓàɓtì ɓum à ki làalamɓɛ̀n lɛ, ɓum, ɓɛɛ ɓɛɛ lɔɔ̀ghrɛn mɛ̀rem, ɓɛ̀ ɓaɓtɛ̀n, fɔɔnnɛ Bɛ̀ll a cenɛn mìni ɓìɓe ɓyaa.
Ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓi ziì Zyude, rì ɓɛ a Yorisalɛm, ɓɛ pɛɛ̀pɛ̀sɛ̀ngày di ɓɛɛ̀ yùyuiy a lɔ̀ŋkii, nyii ki ɓàaɓaɓtì ɓɔ ɓi ǹsyòm wulɛ Zyuridɛŋ, di ɓɛ mɛ kpàki ɓiɓe ɓyaa.
Zyaŋ à ɓaghà ri kìlàà ki ɓɛ tiŋi ri nyùŋ yi syàmoo, à ŋirɛ̀n kànɗa à gòò ɓi kìɓon, à ki ɗiɗi lɛ, rì ɓìtàtàɗ, rì mɔ̀ɔ mɛ ilòò wu ɓɛ pisii yì ɓi cog.
A kakàlìghà ɓum lɛ: Roànɛ à rìì mɛ̀ ajɛ̀m, à cee mɛ̀ ɓi-tèɗ, ǹkpaŋi ɓi ɓi ǹkoŋ wulɛ ǹlaŋi, ǹfùmì mɛ̀ɗig mii mɛ gòò.
Mɛ̀, m̀bàɓtii mìni rì mɛ̀nig, kìɓan kifog nyii ri mìni ɓiì ɓàɓtii ri Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghày.
Lɔŋ ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ̀n, Yeesus à pɛsɛngày a Naazarɛt, ɓi kiden ki zi ki a Galile à yùy, Zyaŋ à ki ɓàɓti nyi ɓi Zyuridɛŋ.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à kpaŋkpàŋgày ɓi mɛ̀nig, nni à ghɛngà di ɗyoo ɗi nɛmɓɛɛ, Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay ki sɛnsɛ̀n yì nyi ɓi nyoo fɛ lɛ yɛ̀ɛ kuùkuù.
Jɛ̀ɛ̀ i ki ɓɔ̀ɓ yi aɗyoo lɛ: Ù ri Man wɛm̀ à ǹɗem, ɓi wɔ̀ nnɛ ǹfoŋi kìnyàà kɛm̀ kìcèm.
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn, nni Nghay à Bɛ̀ll à ghàskà kì tinii Yeesus lɛ a kɛǹ ɓi-reɓ.
Fɔɔnnɛ à ghagsighà mɛ̀ru mɛ̀tin mɛɓɛɛ̀ ɓi-reɓ wiǹ, Satàn a fèèghrɛ̀n nyi wɔɔ. À ghɛghɛ̀ɓkà wɔɔ ri nyàm yi ɓi cog, wɔ̀lɛ ɓum ɓɛ titom ɓɛ kikìghà nyi tìtom.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà di ɓɛ mɛ ɓan Zyaŋ, Yeesus à kɛ̀ngà a Galile, à kakàlì Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ à Bɛ̀ll.
À kpaakpààghà ɓum lɛ: Cààmɛ̀n ki ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ, kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll ki mɛ tyɛ̀ɛ̀tɛn yi; lɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛɛna mɛ̀rem, ɓi gherɛn Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à ghaghàghìyà ɓi ǹwɔŋì wu riɓày ànɛ a Galile, nni à ghɛngà ɓɛ̀-Simɔn ɓɛɛ̀ Andire à geni di ɓɛɛ̀ pìpig dam ɓi rìɓày, lɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓɛ̀pììgh-dam.
Yeesus à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Nɔ̀ɔ̀tiina mɛ̀, di ǹki lɛ ɓi ɓa ɓɛ̀syòŋì-ɓum.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ghaskà kì càri dam yaa, ɓɛ nɔɔ̀tì nyi.
Yɛ̀ɛ à kɛ̀ɛ̀dìghà tì asu lɛsàg, nni à ghɛngà Zyag, man à Zeɓede ɓɛɛ Zyaŋ à geni; ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓi rìpègsɛ̀n ɗi dam yaa ɓi kìkɔm ɓiɗùm.
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à ghaskà ɓɔ ki reŋii, ɓɛ̀roɓɛǹ ɓɛ rinì Zeɓede à seŋi wàà ɓi kìkɔm, rì ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay, ɓɛ nɔɔ̀tì nyi.
Nni ɓɛ kɛngà a Kapɛrinawum, Yeesus à ɗiŋì ɓi naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n ŋwosi Saɓàt; à tumɛ̀n rìrèsàg ɗi ɓum.
Ɓum ɓɛ kuuràkà rìrèsàg ɗii, ɓisuulɛ ɗi ɓaghà ɓi yɛ̀ɛ ɗi ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n; rìrèsàg ɗii ɗi ɓaghà ɗi ŋwaànɛ ɓɛ faa ìtèɗ wulɛ a reèrèsàg ɓum.
Ŋwaàdɛŋ ànɛ à ɓaghà rì kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay à ɓaghà kɔmiɗ ɓi naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n ì ɓumɓɛ̀n.

Fɔɔnnɛ ŋwaànɛ̀n à syangà jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: Ki rì wɔ̀ la ri ɓìsi, Yeesus ànɛ a Naazarɛt! wàa yùu yì fɛ lɛ u cuùsi ɓìsi? Mɛ̀ ǹkonaagh ki yiì rìkuu ɗi mum ɗi ù rì; wɔ̀ yɛɛ ri roànɛ à rì ǹtɛnɛn, lɛ Bɛ̀ll yɛɛ romiì wɔ̀.
Nni Yeesus à fwààdɛ̀ngà kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay kìn, à kpaa kɔ lɛ: Maarɛn foo, ù ki pɛ̀sɛn ɓi ŋwaànɛ̀n.
Fɔɔnnɛ kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay kìn ki narìghà ŋwaànɛ̀n lɛ saɗ-sààɗ, ki kpaŋ ɓi ŋwaànɛ̀n di kɛɛ̀ syansyàn jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyòò.

Ìris wu ɓangà ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ ghɛngà kìɓan kiǹ ɓɛ tɔɔ̀ghtɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛ̀n ɓɔ rì ɓɔ lɛ: Cɛ kɛɛ ri kɔmiɗ lɛ! wooghna nyɔɔnyɔn à dɔgtɛ̀n ànɛ a rèresi ri ìtèɗ wu rilàmì; a kɔ̀ɔkɔmɛ̀n lɛ rì ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay miì, ɓi ki kìki nyi mɛ̀wog'
Fɔɔnnɛ rìkem ɗi Yeesus ɗi ghaskà ki sàa ɓi ziì Galile bimiɗ.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ kpagày ɓi naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n, nni ɓɛ kɛngà rì ɓɛ̀-Zyag ɓɛɛ Zyaŋ a mɛɛ mɛ ɓɛ̀-Simɔn ɓɛɛ̀ Andire.
Jɛɛ gili Simɔn à ɓaghà kìnɔ̀ŋnɔ̀ŋ lɛ à ɓaghà lɛ tɔ̀gtɔ̀g. Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ fyɛɗmɛ̀ngà kìkpaà Yeesus fìroɓ fi giɓ anɛ̀n.
Yeesus à tyòŋdɛ̀n nyi jàŋbog, à ɓan nyi ɓi càg, à pɛ̀sì nyi aɗyòò; rìɓa ɗi à ɓaghà lɛ tɔ̀gtɔ̀g ɗi leg, à tumɛ̀n ɓɔ rìkàà ɗi ɓiɗilàg.
Yɛ̀ɛ cɛ̀ɛŋkò ki kpagà, ɗi ŋwos a mɛ cèŋ, nni ɓɛ yughày Yeesus lɛ, rì ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ roròɓkà, ri ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà rì ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓi bàn ìnɛn ɓɛ kunìghà asuunaa.

Yeesus à wɔ̀ɔ̀zì ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ ɓɛ roròɓkà tìroɓ mɛ̀kuu lɛ mɛ̀kuu; à nàɓ girig ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay lɛɛ̀gwey, wɔ̀lɛ, à faghà ɓi ɓiɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay ìtèɗ wulɛ ɓyɛɛ toòghrɛn, lɛ ɓi yighà nyi lɛ syeesyee.
Yɛ̀ɛ duri i ɓaghà di ì ti jàŋbog ɗì rìtan, wɔ̀lɛ di birìm ì kaka lɛɛ̀gwey, Yeesus à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà aɗyoo à kpaŋ ɓi dan, à kɛ̀n jàŋ inɛ ɓum ɓɛ wuɓsɛ̀ngà ɓi, à tumɛ̀n rì ɓɔ̀ŋzàg ɗi Bɛ̀ll.
Fɔɔnnɛ Simɔn, ri ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà rì ɓɔ, ɓɛ tumɛ̀ngà nyi rìkaa kìɓan ɗi kìɓan.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ tanɛ̀ngà nyi, ɓɛ kpaa nyi lɛ: Ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛɛ tɔtɔg wɔ.
Yeesus à ɓàg ɓɔ lɛ: Ti kɛǹ jàŋ idɛŋ ɓi ɓɔɔ bàn ɓɛ ɓɛ wuɓsɛɛ fɛ̀, nkalì girig Ɓɔlɛ à Bɛ̀ll wɔɔ, lɛ ɓisuu kisay kiǹ innɛ màa kpaŋiì.
Fɔɔnnɛ à kɛ̀ngà di a rereni ziì Galile à kakàlì Ɓɔlɛ à Bɛ̀ll ɓi naa yi bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n à ki nànaɓ ɓiɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay.
Kukwiy adɛŋ à yùghà Yeesus a nyoo, à kpì nyi asu rì mɛ̀ɗu, à yɛ̀gsì nyi ɓyàg à kpaa lɛ: I ki kɔni wɔ̀, ù rì lɛ ù kì lɛ m̀ɓa ti lɛ syeesyee ɓi nyoo yɛ̀m.
Fɔɔnnɛ nyìighnyìg ì kìghà Yeesus rì ŋwaànɛ̀n, à nàm càg à kòm nyi, à kpaa lɛ: Ki kɔni mɛ̀, ɓaya lɛ syeesyee ɓi nyoo yɔ̀ɔ̀.
Nni kwiy a ŋwaànɛ̀n à ghaskà kì kùrɛɛ, nyoo yìì i sugtì lɛ syeesyee.
Yeesus à ɓaghà lɛ, à mɛ rɔgsag nyi syeesyee à rìrɔ̀gsàg, à ghàs nyi kì càri lɛ a kɛǹ.

À kpaa nyi lɛ: Kɔ̀ɔ fèg mum kì ɓùŋi kiɓan ki; kɛ̀na lɔŋ ki rèsɛɛ ɓi mis mɛ pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀, u ki fa rifa ɗi Moyis à kpaaghà lɛ ɓɛɛ falag ɓisuu zòghɛ̀n yɔ̀ɔ̀, lɛ kɛɛ ɓa ɓɔ kìrèmzɛna ki lɛ ù mɛ wɔ̀n.

Kìɓan kifog, yɛ̀ɛ ŋwaànɛ̀n à kɛ̀ngà, nni à tumɛ̀ngà rìlààlàmɓɛ̀n ɗi ɓɔlɛ à kìɓan kiǹ, à sààsààtì nyi lèg ànɛ lɛ Yeesus à ɓatìghà ɓi lɛ à ɗiŋì ɓi bàn ìdɛŋ ɓi mɛ̀tàna. Wɔ̀lɛ àa ǹti à kɔ̀ràg ɓi ɓɛ̀kòdò ɓɛ ɓɛ lɛŋzɛɛ rì bàn, rì jàŋ yi ɓum ɓɛ wuɓsɛɛ ɓi, fɔɔnnɛ ɓum ɓɛ pɛɛ̀pɛ̀sɛ̀ngày ɓɛ̀tum ɓɛ̀cèm, ɓɛ yuyù nyi kì ghɛnghɛni.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɔɔ mɛru ɓɛ ghaghìghà, nni Yeesus à sugtìghà a Kapɛrinawum; yɛ̀ɛ ɓum ɓɛ wokà lɛ, à rì a mɛɛ,
ɓɛ taŋzɛ̀ngà lɛɛ̀gwey lèg ànɛ lɛ, kìtuɓi ki ɓatìghà ɓi nsoò asuunaa; fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à kpaakpààghà ɓɔ ɓìɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll.
Nni ɓum ɓɛniǹ ɓɛ tɛkày kìsɛkɛ̀rɛ̀ ɓi kon ɓɛ yuiy nyi rì kɔ.

Wɔ̀lɛ ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓi lɛ, ɓɛ kɛǹ rì kìsɛkɛ̀rɛ̀ kiǹ lɛsaaɗ yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus lɛ gùl ì ghekà bee; nni ɓɛ pinìghà fìran ɓi jàŋ inɛ Yeesus à rɛrɛ̀lìghà, ɓɛ rɔŋzìì min ŋwaànɛ̀n fɔlɔɔ ɓi kon wiì.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à ghɛngà rìgherɛ̀n ɗi ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓaghà rì ɗyɔ, nni à kpaaghà kìsɛkɛ̀rɛ̀ kiǹ lɛ: Man wɛm̀, ɓìɓe ɓyɔɔ ɓi ti ɓìcenɛn.
Ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà wɔɔ ɓɛ kɔ̀kɔriyɛn, ɓɛ kpaakpààghà ɓi mɛ̀rem maa lɛ:
Lannɛ ŋwaànɛ a tòtog fɛlɛ? A feefengì Bɛ̀ll. Ghɛn adɛŋ yɛɛ ri lɛ à cenɛ̀n mum ɓìɓe, i ki yin lɛ Bɛ̀ll cɛ̀ncii!
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à ghàskà kì yiì kìɓan ki ɓɛ fefèkà, nni à tɔkà ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓisuucɛ nnɛ ɓì rì rì mɛ̀kuu mɛ mɛyitì mɛǹ ɓi nɗem?
Kìɓan aɗi kɛɛ yeesɛɛ foo? Rìkpaa ɗi ǹkpaa kìsɛkɛ̀rɛ̀ lɛ ɓìɓe ɓyɔɔ ɓi ti ɓìcenɛn gìn, rìkpaa ɗi ǹkpaà kɔ lɛ, pɛ̀sɛn aɗyoo u teɗ kon wɔɔ̀ u kɛǹ?
Nni ɓi ɗi lɛ, ɓi yi lɛ Man à mum à rì rì ìtèɗ wulɛ a cenɛ̀n mum ɓìɓe fɛ ɓi ziinɛ,
Yeesus à kpaaghà kìsɛkɛ̀rɛ̀ kiǹ lɛ: Pɛ̀sɛn aɗyoo, u teɗ kon wɔɔ̀, u sug.

Nni ŋwaànɛ̀n à ghàskà kì pɛ̀sɛɛ aɗyoo, à teɗ kon wiì à kpaŋ, ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ seesèè, kìɓan ki wey ɓɔ yɛ̀ɛ rìtɔŋ; ɓɛ keèkèmzì Bɛ̀ll di ɓɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa lɛ: Tì ka ghɛngà ɓi rikuu ɗi kiɓan yɛ̀ɛ ɗi.
Yeesus à kɛ̀ɛ̀dìghà tì ɓi bèn ì rìɓày, ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ yuyùy nyi a nyoo, nyii ki rèresi ɓɔ ɓìɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à ghaghàghìyà, nni à ghɛngà Levi man à Alfe, di à kɔ̀kɔrii jàŋ inɛ ɓɛ m̀peghì làmpoŋ̀, fɔɔnnɛ à kpaaghà nyi lɛ: Nɔ̀ɔ̀ti mɛ̀, Levi à pɛ̀sɛ̀n aɗyoo à nɔ̀ɔ̀tì nyi.

Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à ɗiɗìghà ɓìɗilàg ɓi naa ì Levi, ɓɛ̀terì-làmpoŋ̀ lɛɛ̀gwey rì ɓɛ̀kìì-kìɓe ɓɛ yughà kì kɔ̀rii ɓi riɗi ɗi ɓyom ǹɗaŋ ri nyi rì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii, ɓisuulɛ ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ nnɔ̀ɔ̀tàg nyi ɓìtuu ɓìtuu.

Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓɛ ɓi nɗaŋ wu Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ ghɛngà nyi di a ɗiɗi ǹɗaŋ ri ɓɛ̀terì-làmpoŋ̀, rì ɓɛ̀kìì-kìbe, nni ɓɛ tɔkà ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii lɛ: Ɓisuucɛ nnɛ ǹɗèsàg wìn a ɗiɗi ǹɗaŋ ri ɓɛ̀terì-làmpoŋ̀, rì ɓɛ̀kìì-kìɓe?

Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à wokà ǹtɔɔ̀tɔɔgh wiǹ, nni à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ yin ɓiì roroɓi, ɓɛ ti ɓɛ kɛɛ ɓa ri zày ì dɔgtà, lɔŋ ɓɛ̀roroɓ ɓɛɛ ti ɓɛ ɓalàg rì zày ìnɛn. Mɛ̀ ǹ-yùghà ɓi ki reŋii ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri lɛsaaɗ, lɔŋ ɓɛ̀kìì-kìɓe ɓɛɛ̀ɓɛ ǹ-yùghà kì reŋii.

Ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ Zyaŋ rì ɓɛ ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ nti ɓɛ celàg ɓìɗilàg; nni ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ yughà ki tɔɔgh Yeesus lɛ: Ɓisuucɛ nnɛ ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ Zyaŋ rì ɓɛ ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ celàg ɓìɗilàg ɓyaàmɛ̀n ɓidɛŋ, ɓɛnkɔɔ ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ cèli!
Nni Yeesus à ɓakà ɓɔ lɛ: Mɛ̀ghan mɛ ŋwaànɛ à wɔlɛɛ mɛ ri nya lɛ mɛ celì ɓìɗilàg di ǹwɔlì à kaka nɗaŋ ri ɓɔ! Cààmɛ̀n kìcèm ki ǹwɔlì à kaka nɗaŋ ri ɓɔ, ɓɛ yin lɛ ɓɛ celì ɓìɗilàg.
Wɔ̀lɛ cààmɛ̀n ki lɛ ɓɛɛ pisi ǹwɔlì ɓi nyìinyìm wàà ki tiì, cààmɛ̀n kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki ɓɛ ri min ɓiì cèlii ɓiɗilàg.
Ŋwaà yin lɛ à teɗ zyònà ì kìlàà ki nyɔn lɛ a raɗ ɗyas ɗi kitùg ki kilàà miì, ɓisuulɛ zyònà ì kìlàà ì nyɔn ì rì ɓìì tùnii kitùg ki kilàà, ɗyas ɗìn ɗi teghɛ̀n tì.
Ɓaà ki foŋ ɓi mɛrɔ̀g mɛ nyɔn ɓi ɓìtùg ɓi ɓiren, ɓisuulɛ mɛ̀rɔ̀g mɛ ri ɓiì weeyii ɓiren, mɛ̀rɔ̀g rì ɓìren ɓi ɗyaŋ ɓìcèm. Wɔ̀lɛ ɓɛɛ̀ fogi mɛrɔ̀g mɛ nyɔn ɓi ɓìren ɓi nyɔ̀n.
Ŋwosi Saɓàt àdɛŋ, Yeesus à ghaghàghìyà ɓi dɛmi nyas. Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ghaghàghìyà fɔlɔɔ, ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛ tumɛ̀n rìsòsòrì ɗi nyas.
Nni Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ tɔkà Yeesus lɛ: Ghɛna ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɔɔ! Ɓisuucɛ nnɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kìki kiɓan ki ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓis ɓi reègh lɛ mum kɛɛ̀ kì ŋwosi Saɓàt?
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à ɓakà ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓì ka ɓalà ɓi com ki Davit à kìghà, yɛ̀ɛ zày ì kɔ̀ngà lɛ rì nyi rì ɓum ɓii, nyi kɛ̀ɛ̀ com ki ɗiyɛn?

Yɛ̀ɛ à ɗiŋìghà ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll, ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki Aɓyatar à ɓaghà pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ àgwey, à ɗi bìrɛs yi ɓum ɓɛ faghà ɓisuu Bɛ̀ll, à ki teɗ gàɓ, à fa ɓum ɓii, kɔm̀ lɛ ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓyɛɛ kpaaghi lɛ lɔŋ ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ cɛ̀ncaa ɓɛɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɗiì bìrɛs yiǹ.
Nni Yeesus à kpaaghà Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛǹ lɛ: Bɛ̀ll à rɛsìghà Saɓàt ɓi kìrɔɔ ki mum, wɔ̀lɛ à kìghà ɓi mum lɛ a ɓa ǹkpàn a gòn inɛ̀n.
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ Man à mum à làmii girig Saɓàt.
Yeesus à sugtìghà ki ɗiŋii ɓi naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n. Ŋwaàdɛŋ à ɓaghà wɔɔ ri càg ki ɓɔmɛn,
ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà wɔɔ, ɓɛ pɛɛ̀zì mis rì Yeesus lɛ ɓɛɛ ghɛǹ, ǹkòo à wɔ̀ɔ̀zii ŋwaànɛ̀n ŋwosi Saɓàt, di ɓɛɛ sɔmɛn nyi.
Nni Yeesus à kpaaghà mum àncèm lɛ: Pɛ̀sɛn aɗyoo, u rɛli foo ɓi nyìinyìm.
Fɔɔnnɛ à tɔkà ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓis ɓi gherɛɛ nya lɛ mum a ki kìrɔɔ gìn kìɓe ŋwosi Saɓàt? Lɛ mum a ghɛɓsi romum gìn, a wey nyi ŋwosi Saɓàt? Ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ minɛ̀n ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓàg ntɔɔ̀tɔɔgh wii.

Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à kɛɛ̀sìghà mis ɓi ɓumɓɛ̀n di a wowog bim, rì ǹɗemi-kɛŋɛn ɓi kìtèri kaa ki ǹɗem, à kpaa min ŋwaànɛ à ɓaghà càg kiɓɔmɛn lɛ: Nàma càg kɔɔ, ŋwaànɛ̀n a nàm càg kii kiǹ, ki sugtì lɛ syeesyee.
Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ kpagà, ɓɛ ghas kì kìi righàdà rì ɓɛ̀gàŋgam ɓɛ Eroodɛ, lɛ ɓɛɛ ghɛǹ lannɛ ɓɛ ri lɛ ɓɛ ki lɛ ɓɛɛ wey Yeesus.
Nni Yeesus à kɛ̀ngà rì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓi bèn ì rìɓày, coo kituu ki ɓum ki nɔɔ̀tì nyi; ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ pɛsɛ̀ngày a Galile rì a Zyude
rì a Yorisalɛm, rì a Idume, rì cɛcɛɗ ki Zyuridɛŋ rì ɓi ɓɛ̀kòdò ɓɛ ɓɛ wuɓsɛɛ bàn yi lɛ, rì Tiir ri Sidɔŋ; ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ yuyùghà Yeesus a nyoo, lɛ ɓɛ wokà ɓìɓan ɓìcèm ɓi à kìkìghà.
Nni Yeesus à kpaaghà ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii lɛ, ɓɛɛ yu nyi ri maa kìkɔm, lɛ gwìy i ɓum ìnɛ̀n yɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ turi nyi.
Ɓisuulɛ, yɛ̀ɛ à wɔ̀ɔ̀wɔ̀ɔ̀zìghà ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey, ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓiì roroɓi ɓɛ kpikpìghà nyi ɓi nyoo lɛ ɓɛɛ kom nyi.
Ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay ɓi ɓalàkà lɛ, i ɓi ghɛɛ Yeesus, ɓi ɓag nyi mɛ̀ɗu asu, ɓi ki syan jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: Ù ri Man à Bɛ̀ll.
Kìɓan kifog Yeesus à ɓààɓàŋzìghà mis lɛɛ̀gwey, à rèrèg ɓyɔ lɛ byɛ̀ kɛ̀ɛ kì lɛ ɓum ɓɛɛ yi nyi.
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à ɓɔkà min ɓi dòn aɗyoo , à regì ɓumɓɛ à kɔ̀ngà lɛ a reŋi, ɓɛ̀roɓɛ̀n ɓɛ kɛǹ nyi a nyoo.
A ɓɔ̀n min ɓum ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì ɓɛɓɛɛ̀ ɓi ɓumɓɛ̀n lɛ a kɛɛ̀ghag rì ɓɔ, à ki rom ɓɔ lɛ ɓɛɛ kɛǹ kì kakalii Ɓɔlɛ à Bɛ̀ll.
À faghà ɓɔ ìtèɗ wulɛ, ɓɛɛ nanaɓ ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay.
Ɓumɓɛ à ɓɔ̀ngà ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì ɓɛɓɛɛ̀ ɓɛ ɓaghà lɛ: Rì Simɔn ànɛ Yeesus àa ǹkpɔgì lɛ Pyɛɛri
rì Zyag, man à Zeɓede ɓɛɛ Zyaŋ à geni, ɓɛ Yeesus a ǹkpɔgii lɛ: Bwanɛrigɛs, yɛɛ lɔɔ lɛ, ɓɔn ɓɛ baàbàn;
rì Andire, rì Filiɓ, rì Batelemi, rì Matyoo, rì Tomas, rì Zyag man à Alfe, rì Tadee, rì Simɔn ànɛ à ɓaghà ŋwaànɛ a Kana;
ri Zyudas Iskariyot ŋwaànɛ à kàɓkà Yeesus.
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn, nni ɓɛ sugtìghày a mɛɛ, coo gùl ì ɓum ì taŋzɛ̀n tì lèg ànɛ lɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓi ri bee inɛ ɓɛ ri lɛ ɓɛ ɗi ɓìɗilàg.
Yɛ̀ɛ naà-ɓum ì Yeesus i wokà kìɓan kiǹ nni ɓɛ yughà nyi kì terì lɛ ɓɛ kpaakpààghà lɛ, à rì nya m̀ɓùùsɛn.

Ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓɛ ɓɛ pɛsɛ̀ngày a Yorisalɛm, ɓɛ kpaaghà girig lɛ: À rì rì kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay ki lɛ Bɛlzeɓul, a nànaɓ ɓiɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay rì ìtèɗ wu Bɛlzeɓul ànɛ à rì rìfòm ɗi ɓiɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay.
Nni Yeesus à reŋìghà ɓɔ, a kpaa ɓɔ ɓi dàɗkì lɛ: Lannɛ Satàn a rì lɛ à nàɓtì nyimiɗ?
Kìlɔ̀ŋ kìcèm ki ɓum ɓɛ miì ɓɛ lanɛɛ, ɓɛ ram wɛ̀y ɓɔ rì ɓɔ, ki ti ki cuughì.
Naà-ɓum ìnɛ ɓum ɓɛ miì ɓɛ ramzɛɛ wɛ̀y ɓɔ rì ɓɔ, ì yin lɛ ì kɛ̀n beèbɛ̀y;
i Satàn a pɛ̀sɛɛ, à ram wɛ̀y ri nyimiɗ, di à ti yɛɛ lɔɔ ri ǹlànag; kìlɔ̀ŋ kii ki yiìdi lɛ ki kɛǹ asu ki ɓaɓà, di ki ɓi nyi ki leègh.
Ŋwaà yin lɛ à ɗiŋì ɓi naà kìtèetèɗ ki mum, à sàŋ ìkum wu roànɛ̀n, di à loogh ɓi nyi kì kàŋi bɛn; i à mɛ kàŋ nyi bɛn, fɔɔnnɛ à rì lɛ à sàŋ min ɓyom ɓi roànɛ̀n.
Ǹkalii mìni ɓi saaɗ lɛ, Bɛ̀ll à ɓiì cenɛɛ ɓum ɓìɓe ɓyaa ɓìcèm, rì tìfena ticèm ti ɓɛ fengàkà nyi;
kìɓan kifog ɓaa cenɛɛ gɛ ɓi ŋwaànɛ à fengii Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay nsoò ŋwos bog, ɓisuulɛ ŋwaànɛ̀n miì à kìi kìɓe ki à kɔ̀rii gɛ rì kɔ fìɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀.
Yeesus à kpaaghà ɓum fɔlɔɔ lɛ, ɓɛ kpaakpààghà lɛ, à rì rì kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay.
Jɛɛ Yeesus rì ɓɛ̀geni ɓii, ɓɛ yughày, ɓɛ rɛrì ɓi dan, ɓɛ rom mum lɛ a reŋiì nyi.
Ɓum ɓɛ kɔrìghà ɓɛ kɔmzɛ̀n nyi, nni ɓɛ kpaaghà nyi lɛ: Gaa, ri ɓɛ̀goni ɓɛɛ tɔtɔg wɔ fɛnii ɓi dan.
Nni Yeesus à ɓàkà lɛ: Ghɛn yɛɛ ri jɛɛ wɛ̀m, ɓɛ̀ghɛn ɓɛɛ ri ɓɛ̀geni ɓɛ̀m?
Fɔɔnnɛ à kɛ̀ɛ̀sìghà mis ɓi ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ kɔmzɛ̀ngà nyi ɓɛ̀n, à kpaa lɛ: Jɛɛ wɛ̀m rì ɓɛ̀geni ɓɛ̀m, ɓɛɛ kɔ̀ɔ̀kɔɔ̀tɛ̀n lɛ;
ɓisuulɛ, ŋwaànɛ à kìi rìkɔ̀n ɗi Bɛ̀ll, nnyɛɛ ri geni wɛ̀m à baŋì, nsoò lɛ à giɓ nsoò lɛ jɛɛ wɛ̀m.

Nni Yeesus à tumɛ̀ngà tì rìrèèrèsàg ɗi ɓum ɓi bèn ì rìɓày. Coo kituu ki ɓum ki taŋzɛ̀n nyi a nyoo lèg ànɛ lɛ à ɓɔkà ɓi kìkɔm à kɔ̀rìì ɓi mɛ̀nig, gɛ mum ànɛ̀n bimiɗ à rɔ̀ɓ yì a cɛɗ.
Yeesus à rèèrèsàkà ɓɔ ɓìɓan lɛɛ̀gwey ɓi dàɗkì, nni ɓi ɓìɓan ɓiǹ à kalìghà ɓɔ lɛ:
Wooghna! Nsalì-dɛm odɛŋ yɛɛ pɛsɛ̀ngà lɛ à kɛ̀ɛ kì mìsi boo ì ɓyom ɓi dɛm.
Yɛ̀ɛ à mìmìskà, gàɓ ì boo ìdɛŋ ì kpì ɓi bee aɗyoo, tììlì ti yu, ti ɗi yɔ̀ bimiɗ.
Gàɓ ìmbog ì kpì ɓi jàŋ i tìcɔg ìnɛ ì ɓìɓkà ɓi, ì ghàs kì ròo ɓisuulɛ ziinɛ̀n ì fɔmgà ɓi.
Wɔ̀lɛ yɛ̀ɛ ŋwos a kpagày ɓyom ɓi ɗig, mɛ̀ɗyèm mɛ wom̀dàg lɛ ɓi ɓaghà kɛ̀ɛ̀ gàŋ.
Nni gàɓ ìmbog ì kɛ̀ngà kì kpìi ɓi ɓìkàrag, yɛ̀ɛ ɓìkàrag ɓi tɔɓkà, ɓi laatàg yɔ̀, ì rɔ̀ɓ yɛ̀ kɛɛ wum.
Nni boo ìdɛŋ i kɛ̀ngà kì kpìi ɓi syeesyee à zi, ì ròò, ì tɔɔ, ì ki wum lɛ, nɗyèm wu wu yii ɓìɗùn rìtin ɗì ǹtɛ̀ɗ, wu wu yii ɓìɗùn mɛ̀tin mɛ̀ra, wu wu yii, ɓìɗùn mɛ̀tin mɛtaǹ.
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à kpaatìghà lɛ: Ŋwaànɛ à rì rì mɛ̀reè, mɛ lɛ à wog, à wog.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à kɛ̀ngà dɛgà, nni ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà nyi jàŋbog, rì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛ tumɛ̀ngà nyi rìtɔg ɗi mɛtɔɔ̀gtɔɔgh ɓi dàɗkì yi à tetèkà.
Nni à ɓàkà ɓɔ lɛ: Mìnii ɓɛ ki ri ki fayɛn lɛ ɓi yi ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi ɓaghà ɓì nyamɛn ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll; ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ a ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛmbog ɓɛɛ̀ wowog lɔŋ ɓiɓan ɓìcèm yɛ̀ɛ dàɗkì
lɛ kɛɛ ɓa lɛ, nsoò ɓaa seesèè lɛ tɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ghɛn, ɓɛ ri ki wog lɛ syeesyee, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ yi, lɛ di ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki ɓa lɛ ɓɛ lɔɔ̀ghrɛ̀n mɛ̀rem, Bɛ̀ll à ki cenɛn ɓɔ ɓìɓe ɓyaa.
Nni Yeesus à tɔgtìghà ɓɔ lɛ: Yɛ̀ɛ ɓì woogh ɓi dàɗkì ìnɛ azi, lannɛ ɓì rì min ɓiì woògh azi a dàɗkì yimbog yìcèm?
M̀mìsì boo à rì ŋwaànɛ a sàasaàtì Ɓɔlɛ à Bɛ̀ll.
Ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ ri yɛ̀ɛ tim̀ à bee ànɛ boo ì rààghà miì ɓɔ yɛɛ ri ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ kilàg lɛ, lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ woogh ɓìɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll lɔɔ, Satàn a yùy, à pisì ɓɔ ɓyɔ ɓi ǹɗem.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ghaɓkà boo ɓi tìcɔg, ɓɔ yɛɛ ri ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ ti lɛ, i ɓɛ woogh ɓìɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll, ɓɛ ghas ɓyɔ kì terì rì kìnyàà;
kìɓan kifog, ɓɔ kɛ̀ɛ gàŋ; ɓɛ ri làg lɛ ŋɛ̀ɛ̀ghŋɛ̀ɛ̀gh lɛ i ɓɛ tanɛɛ rì ntɔɓ, nsoò lɛ ǹyeèsɛ̀n àdɛŋ ɓisuu kiɓan ki Bɛ̀ll, lɔŋ lɛ ɓɛ naŋi rìgherɛ̀n.
Ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ ghaɓkà boo ɓi ɓìkàrag ɓɛ ri ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ wokì ɓìɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll,
kìɓan kifog mɛ̀tɔɓ mɛ ɓi ziinɛ, rì kìsee ki ikum, rì gɛ ɓìɓan ambog ànɛ a syòŋsyoŋ mɛrem, ɓi laatàg jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll ìnɛn yɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ghɛn bee inɛ lɛ yɛ̀ɛ wum ɓìdùn.

Ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛmbog ɓɛ ɓɛ ghaɓkà boo ɓi syeesyee à zi, ɓɔ yɛ̀ɛ ri ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ wokì ɓiɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll, ɓɛ ki wum ɓidùn fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ boo inɛ ì kìghà lɛ, nɗyèm wu wu yii, wu wum ɓìɗùn rìtin ɗì ǹtɛ̀ɗ, wu wu yii ɓìɗùn mɛ̀tin mɛraa, wu wu yii, ɓìɗùn mɛ̀tin mɛtaǹ.
Nni Yeesus à kpaatìghà ɓɔ lɛ: Mɛ̀ɛ nti ɓɛɛ saaghrag lamɓà ɓi kìrɛsì kii aɗyoo? Ɓɛɛ rɛsag nyi a kìbɔkɔ̀ zi giǹ, a ɓyom ɓilɔ̀ŋ zi?
Ɓisuulɛ kìɓan kidɛŋ ki ki ri a rìnyam kaa rɔ̀ɓ ɓi lɛ ki yilɛɛ ɓi; dwìɗ idɛŋ yɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki rɔ̀ɓ lɛ ì kpagii ɓi dan.
Ŋwaànɛ a rì rì mèree, mɛ lɛ à wog à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì woògh.
Nni à kpatìghà ɓɔ lɛ: Kɛ̀ ɓi kì wàŋ rì ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi wowog' Lɛ vèg ìnɛ ɓì ti ɓì fèkì ɓum ɓyom miì, yɛ̀ɛnnɛ ɓɛ ri girig mìni ɓiì fèegh miì, ɓɛ ki ceesag ti ɓidɛŋ miì aɗyòò
Ɓisuulɛ ŋwaànɛ à rì rì ɓyom innɛ ɓɛ ɓiì fatii, wɔ̀lɛ roànɛ à rì kɛ̀ɛ̀ kɔ, nsoò maa gàɓ ànɛ à rì rì nyi ɓɛ ɓatɛ̀n.
Yeesus à kpaaghà tì lɛ: Kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll ki pisɛɛ rì ŋwaàdɛŋ ànɛ à mìsi ɓyom ɓi dɛm.
Àa soo lali, àa soo ki kɔ̀rii cem, ɓyom ɓìn ɓi ri ɓiì kìi lɛ, ɓi roò, ɓi tɔɔ, Ŋwaànɛ̀n kɛ̀ɛ yi lannɛ ki nkɛ̀ɛ̀kɛɛ.
Zi yɔ̀miɗ yɛ̀ɛ ri ɓiì kìi lɛ ǹɗuŋ wɛɛ roò, wu tɔɔ, wu foŋ ɓìɓàɓ, ɓìɓàɓ ɓi foŋ mis.
I ɓi mɛ ɓàŋ, ɓɛ tumɛ̀n rìrengì ɗi mɛɗyèm rì zɛ̀m lɛ mɛ̀saŋ mɛ kpaŋi yɛɛ lɔ̀ɔ̀.
Nni Yeesus à kpaatìghà ɓum lɛ, tì rì lɛ tì fèg ɓà kilɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll rì cɛ? Nsoò lɛ dàɗkì ìbe yɛ̀ɛnɛ tì rì lɛ tì teɗ lɛ ti resi mìni yɛ̀ɛ kìlɔ̀ŋ kiǹ ki ri?
Kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll ki pisɛɛ rì zàm ì rìwom. Zàm inɛn yɛ̀ɛ ti ì ɓiisàg ki tɛɓɓɛɛ di ɓɛ ɓɛli yɔ̀ ɓi boo yi ɓyom yìcèm yi ɓi ziinɛ;
kìɓan kifog i ɓɛ ɓɛli yɔ̀, ì ròò, ì tɔɔ, ì ghay coo kite ki ki ceghii ɓìɓɛ̀ɛ̀ɓɛ̀lì ɓìcèm ɓi ɓi dɛm, ki foŋ ɓyoo myaɓ lèg ànɛ lɛ tììlì ti aɗyoo ti ri lɛ ti togì ɓìlaa ɓyaa miì.
Rì mɛ̀kuu mɛ dàɗkì mɛ fɔlɔɔ lɛɛ̀gwey, nnɛ Yeesus à kakàlìghà ɓɔ ɓìɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll lèg bimiɗ ànɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà lɛ ɓɛ wog.
Àa ǹti kɛ̀ɛ tòòghrɛn ri ɓum kɛ̀ɛ̀ dàɗkì, kìɓan kifog àa ǹti à kìlàg lɛ, i àa rɔ̀ɓ ri ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɔ rì ɓɔ, à tɛɛ̀zì ɓɔ ɓìɓan ɓìcèm ɓi ɓi dàɗkì yiǹ.
Ŋwos nyimiɗ anɛ̀n, di cɛŋkò ki mɛ kpaŋ nni Yeesus à kpaaghà ɓɔ Lɛ: Ti syàana cɛcɛɗ kimbog.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ caɗkà gùl ì ɓum lɛ yɛ̀ɛ sug, nni ɓɛ kɛngà rì Yeesus ɓi kìkɔm ki à ɓaghà miì, wɔ̀lɛ ɓìkɔm ɓidɛŋ ɓi ɓaghà girig wɔɔ nɗaŋ ri nyi.
Fɔɔnnɛ coo bɛ̀ɓ ki tumɛ̀ngày rìfɛɓsìì rì ìtèɗ, ɓìkus ɓi riɓày ɓi kɛnkɛ̀n ɓi kìkɔm ɓi lèg ànɛ lɛ kìkɔm ki ɓaghà di mɛ̀nig mɛ ti miì ɓiì ronɗoni.
Yeesus à ɓaghà ɓiì lalali ɓi kìtòn ki kikɔm, à sasàghì nto ɓi kaŋdì. Ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ ghemzì nyi, ɓɛ kpaa nyi lɛ: Ǹɗèsàg, ǹɗem wu kɛsii ɓi wɔ ri kìɓan ki lɛ tì yùu kì cuu yɛɛ lɛ!
Nni Yeesus à ghèmbɛ̀ngà, à fwààdɛ̀n bɛ̀ɓ, à kpaa rìɓày lɛ: Maarɛn, u kɔri lɛ fyòoog, nsoò maa m̀pɔ̀ɓ kɛ̀ɛ wooghrɛn ti.
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn Yeesus à kpaaghà ɓɛ̀yilàg lɛ: Ɓisuucɛ nnɛ ɓì risii yì fɔlɔɔ? Lannɛ ɓì kaka kɛ̀ɛ̀ rìgherɛ̀n?
Nni ɓɛ kɛngà kì kpaŋì cɛcɛɗ ki riɓày ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki ɓɛ-Gerazenyɛŋ.
Lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à sɛngà kìkɔm, ŋwaàdɛŋ à kpaŋ yì ɓi dɛm i zɔ̀ŋ, à yù kì tuusɛɛ ri nyi; ŋwaàncèm à ɓaghà rì kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay.
Àa ǹti à laayì ɓi dɛm i zɔ̀ŋ, fɔɔnnɛ ŋwaàdɛŋ à ɓatìghà ɓi ri ìtèɗ wulɛ à ɓan ŋwaànɛ̀n, à kàŋ nyi nsoò rì mɛ̀sɛ̀ŋi,

ɓisuulɛ, ɓyààmɛ̀n lɛɛ̀gwey, ɓɛ kagà nyi mɛ̀kòò ri bɔŋ, ɓɛ sugì nyi mɛ̀sɛ̀ŋi ɓi ɓyàg, kìɓan kifog, àa ǹti à pwagì bɔŋ, à ki rengi mɛsɛ̀ŋi; mum ànɛ à ɓaghà lɛ à cenɛ̀n ŋwaànɛ̀n à ɓaghà ɓi.
Yɛ̀ɛ ìru, yɛ̀ɛ ŋwos, ŋwaànɛ̀n àa ǹdègì ɓi dɛm i zɔ̀ŋ, rì ɓi don aɗyoo di a syansyan, à ki kpɛ̀ɛkpɛɛ̀rɛ̀n nyimiɗ ri gɔ̀g.
Yɛ̀ɛ à ghɛngày Yeesus fìràɓ, à gheŋmɛ̀n yì, à yù nyi kì ɓaàgh mɛ̀ɗu asu
à ki syan jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo rì ìtèɗ lɛ: Yeesus, Man à Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à teŋmɛɛ kɛ̀ɛ̀ vèg cɛ kɛɛ rì wɔ̀ rì mɛ̀? M̀ɓɔ̀ŋzii wɔ̀ ɓi ɗii ɗi Bɛ̀ll lɛ, kɔ̀ɔ ki mɛ ǹtɔɓ.
À kalìghà fɔlɔɔ lɛ Yeesus à kpaakpààghà nyi lɛ: Kìɓeɓtàg ki ǹghay! Kpaŋa ɓi ŋwaànɛ!
Nni Yeesus à tɔkà min nyi lɛ: Ù rì ɗii lɛ ghɛn? À ɓàg nyi lɛ: Ǹɗì ɗii lɛ: Kìtuu, ɓisuulɛ tì tèghɛɛ lɛɛ̀gwey.
Ŋwaànɛ̀n à ɓɔ̀ŋzàkà Yeesus, à sììrɛ̀n lɛ, Yeesus kɛ̀ɛ nàɓ ɓiɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay ɓìn lɛ ɓyɛɛ pɛsɛn ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ kiǹ, ɓyɛɛ kɛǹ jàŋ idɛŋ.
Wɔ̀lɛ coo kìtuu ki jèè ki ɓaghà ɓiì ɗiɗii ɓyaaɓi jàŋbog rì dòn.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay ɓi ɓɔŋzàkà Yeesus di ɓyɛɛ kpaakpaa lɛ: Rom ɓìsi ɓi kìtuu ki jèè kinii, ti ɗiŋi ɓi yɔ.

Nni Yeesus à gherɛ̀ngà, fɔɔnnɛ ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay ɓìn ɓi kpagà ɓi ŋwaànɛ̀n, ɓi ɗiŋɗàg ɓi jèè; kituu ki jèè kiǹ ki pwaŋɗɛ̀n yì ɓi dòn aɗyoo ki suùrɛ̀n ɓi rìɓày; jèè yiǹ yi ɓaghà nunùg jèè ɓɛ̀tɔɔsìm ɓɛɓɛɛ̀, nni yi cuughà lɔŋ ɓi rìɓày yìcèm.
Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓeŋɓèŋgà jèè yiǹ ɓɛ panìghà rì mɛ̀ree, ɓɛ kɛǹ kì kakalii ɓumɓɛ ɓi bàn, rì ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓi jɛ̀m ì kìlɔ̀ŋ kìɓan kiǹ. Ɓum ɓɛ pɛɛ̀pɛ̀sɛ̀ngày lɛ ɓɛɛ ghɛǹ kìɓan ki ki kilɛ̀ngà kiǹ.
Ɓɛ yu Yeesus a nyoo, ɓɛ ghɛn ŋwaànɛ à ɓaghà rì ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay lɛɛ̀gwey ǹkɔ̀kɔriyɛn, nni ìris wu ɓangà ɓɔ.
Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà wɔɔ yɛ̀ɛ kìɓan kiǹ ki kilɛ̀ngà, ɓɛ kalìghà ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛmbog yɛ̀ɛ kaa ɓaa, à tumɛ̀n ɓi ŋwaà ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay, à kpaŋ ɓi jèè.
Nni ɓɛ tumɛ̀ngà rìɓɔ̀ŋzàg ɗi Yeesus lɛ, a pɛsɛn ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ kaa.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à ɗiɗiŋìghà ɓi kìkɔm, nni ŋwaànɛ à ɓaghà ànɛn ri ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay à ɓɔ̀ŋzàkà nyi, lɛ nyi ɓa ɓi nɗaŋ waanɛ̀n.
Yeesus à ɓèn, wɔ̀lɛ à kpaa ŋwaànɛ̀n lɛ: Sugha a ɓum ɓɔɔ, u kali ɓɔ com kìcèm ki Kan àa kìi ɓisu wɔɔ, rì yɛ̀ɛ àa woogh wɔ̀ nyìighnyìg.
Fɔɔnnɛ ŋwaànɛ̀n à kɛ̀ngà, à tumɛn rìlààlàmɓɛ̀n ɗi com kìcèm ki Yeesus à kìghà ɓisu wii ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki ɓɛ nɗegi lɛ, kìlɔ̀ŋ ki bàn ǹtɛ̀ɗ. Ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ kuuràkà.
Yeesus à sugtìghà kìsyàa ɓɛg àmbog ɓi kìkɔm, coo kituu ki ɓum ki taŋzɛ̀n nyi a nyoo yɛ̀ɛ à ɓaghà ɓi bèn ì rìɓày.
Fɔɔnnɛ mum ɗii lɛ Zyayirus, kìbog ki ɓi ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ lamìghà naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n, à yùghà, à ghɛn Yeesus, à kpì nyi a mɛ̀kòò.
A ki ɓɔ̀ŋzag nyi, à sììrɛ̀n ɓi bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n ìnɛn, à kpaakpàà lɛ: Maa ŋwɔɓti wɛ̀m à giɓ a kɔ̀ɔkɔɔ̀sì, nni yu, u saagh nyi ɓyàg ɓi nyoo, di fɔɔnnɛ à wɔǹ, à ki ɓa ti ri cɛɓ.
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus ɓɛ sugtɛ̀ngà ɓɛɛ Zyayirus, coo kituu ki ɓum ki nɔɔ̀nɔ̀ɔ̀tì nyi, ki kɔm̀ nyi, ki ki sìisiìrì nyi.
Nni giɓ adɛŋ ànɛ à roròɓkà fìroɓ fi lɛ, bwaɓ yi kpaŋkpàŋ nyi ɓyààmɛ̀n ɓìcèm à ɓaghà wɔɔ; fìroɓ fìn fi ɓaghà di fyaa finɛn bèg ǹtèɗ rì yiɓɛɛ̀.

Giɓ anɛ̀n à ɓaghà di à mɛ ghɛn ntɔɓ lɛɛ̀gwey ɓi rìdèŋdèŋ ɗi a ɓɛ̀kìì-boòboo lɛɛ̀gwey à ki yogsi ɓɔɔ ɓyom ɓii ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ à ɓaghà rì ɓɔ, ɓi fìroɓ fii, kìɓan kifog fi kɛnkɛ̀n lɔŋ nyi ɗì rìroròɓ rì ìtèɗ.
Nni yɛ̀ɛ à wokà di ɓɛɛ̀ ɓùŋɓuŋ kiɓan ki Yeesus, fɔɔnnɛ à yùghày Yeesus ajɛ̀m, di a sɔ̀ɔsɔlɛ̀n yì ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓum, à kòm nyi ɓi kìlàà;
ɓisuulɛ à kpaakpààghà ɓi ǹɗem wii lɛ: I m̀mànɛɛ kì kòmi nsoò kìlàà kii, lɔŋ lɛ ǹwɔ̀ni.
Ɓi cààmɛ̀n kɔm̀ kiǹ, bwaɓ yi ghàs kì renɛɛ rikpaŋ ɗi giɓ anɛ̀n, à wog yɛ̀ɛ nyoo yìì i fɛmɓɛɛ, à ghɛn lɛ à wɔ̀ni fìroɓ fii.
Yeesus nyii ghas kì woògh fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ìtèɗ wudɛŋ wu pɛsɛɛ nyi ɓi nyoo, à nìmɓɛ̀n ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓum, à tɔg lɛ: Ghɛn yɛɛ komi mɛ̀ ɓi kìlàà?
Nni ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛ ɓakà nyi lɛ: Ù seesèè lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ gwìy ì ɓum yɛɛ̀ sìisiìrì wɔ̀, ù tɔgtì lɛ ghɛn yɛɛ komi wɔ̀?
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à kɛ̀ɛ̀sìghà mis ɓi ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ kɔmgà nyi lɛ a ghɛǹ ŋwaànɛ àa kòmi nyi.

Nni giɓ ànɛ̀n à risìghà, à nììghnìŋdɛ̀n lɛ kpàg-kpàg lɛ à yighà com ki ki kilɛ̀ngà ɓi nyoo yìì; fɔɔnnɛ à yùghà ki kpìi Yeesus a mɛ̀kòò, à kpaa nyi saaɗ ànɛ ɓi kìɓan kiǹ kìcèm.
Nni Yeesus à kpaaghà nyi lɛ: Iyà, rìgherɛ̀n ɗyɔɔ ɗi ghɛɓsii wɔ̀, kɛ̀na lɛ fyòoog, ù wɔni fìroɓ fyɔɔ yaà.
Di Yeesus à kaka à totòg fɔlɔɔ, nni ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ pɛsɛ̀ngày a mɛɛ mɛ Zyayirus, ɓɛ yu nyi ki kpaa lɛ: Zyairus, gɔ̀n yɔ̀ɔ̀ i mɛ maasì; kɔ̀ɔ yeesi ti ǹɗèsàg zɛy.
Wɔ̀lɛ Yeesus à nɔ̀ɔ̀tìghà ɓi rìkpaa ɗiǹ à kpaaghà lɔŋ ǹlàmì naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n lɛ: Kɔ̀ɔ risi, ɓaya lɔŋ ri rìgherɛ̀n.
Yeesus à gherɛ̀ngà ɓi lɛ, ŋwaàdɛŋ à kɛǹ nyi kì foŋì, lɔŋ Pyɛɛri, rì Zyag ɓɛɛ̀ geni ànɛ lɛ Zyaŋ ɓɛɛ̀ɓɛ à kɛ̀ngà rì ɓɔ.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ kpagà a mɛɛ mɛ rifòm ɗi naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n, Yeesus à tanɛ̀n coo gom ì mɛ̀kɛɛ̀gh, rì ɓìkiŋ ɓi ɓɛ rɔŋɗɔ̀ŋgà.
Fɔɔnnɛ à ɗiŋìghà ɓi naa, à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓisuucɛ nnɛ ɓi rènɗen fɛlɛ di ɓi ɓooghɓoòghrɛ̀n, ŋwɔɓti ànɛ à wii ɓi, à rì yɛɛri ɓi fìlo.
Ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ tumɛ̀n nyi rìwɔ̀wɛ̀y, nni à kpaŋzàkà min ɓɔ ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛcèm; à teɗ lɛ rì seŋi rì jɛɛ man, ri ɓumɓɛ à ɓaghày rì ɓɔ, ɓɛ ɗiŋì ɓi naa ìnɛ ŋwɔɓti à ɓaghà miì.
Nni à ɓangà ŋwɔɓti ɓi càg, à kpaa nyi lɛ: Talita kumi! Yɛɛ lɔɔ lɛ, Ŋwutyàà-giɓ, ǹkalii wɔ̀ lɛ pɛ̀sɛn aɗyòò.
Ŋwutyàà-giɓ anɛ̀n à ghàs kì pɛ̀sɛɛ aɗyoo, à tumɛ̀n rìkɛ̀ɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀, lɛ à ɓaghà di a ti bèg ntɛ̀ɗ rì yìɓɛɛ̀. Ɓum ɓɛ ghɛngà kìɓan kiǹ koŋnyoo lɛɛ̀gwey.
Wɔ̀lɛ Yeesus à rɔ̀gsɛ̀ngà ɓɔ, à siitàg ɓɔ lɛ ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ kali ŋwaàdɛŋ kìɓan kiǹ. À ki kpaa ɓɔ lɛ ɓɛɛ fa ŋwutyàà-giɓ anɛ̀n com kiɗiyɛn.
Nni Yeesus à pɛsɛ̀ngà foo, à kɛ̀n ɓi bàn ìnɛ à tɔɔghà wɔɔ, ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛ nɔɔ̀tì nyi.

Ŋwosi Saɓàt àdɛŋ, à tumɛ̀ngà ɓum rìrèsàg ɓi naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n; gɛ mum ànɛ à wowòkà ɓìtòkì ɓii à kuuràkà lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ tɔtɔg lɛ: À rìì fe ri kìɓan ki? Rìkuu ɗi ɗyomzɛ̀n aɗi ɗyɛɛ ri lɛ? Dàm yi a kìki yi yi ri la?
Àa nnyɛɛ ri kaminɗà, nyi man à Marii, nyi geni ɓɛ̀-Zyag ɓɛɛ Zyoozɛ, rì Zyuudɛ rì Simɔn? Ɓɛ̀geni ɓii ɓɛ ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓɛ yiǹ fɛ rì ɓìsi? Rìɓa ɗii ɗiǹ ɗi rekà ɓɔ lɛ, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ gherɛn nyi.
Yeesus à kpaa min ɓɔ lɛ: Ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan a maà kem ɓi ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ kii; ɓɛ̀yalì ɓii rì naa yìì i ɓum ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ kuurag ri nyi.
Fɔɔnnɛ à kìghà ɓi dàm wɔɔ nsoò bog, i ki cee ɓi lɛ, gàɓ ì ɓɛ̀roroɓ ìnɛ a wɔ̀ɔ̀zìghà di à saghii ɓɔ ɓyàg ɓi nyòò.
Yeesus à kuuràkà yɛ̀ɛ ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓaghà fɔlɔɔ ri nyoey, à kɛ̀n asu à rerènì ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓi jàŋbog, di a rèeresàg ɓum ɓìɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll.
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à reŋìghà ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ntɛ̀ɗ rì ɓɛɓɛɛ̀, à tumɛ̀n ɓɔ rìɓaskì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛɓɛɛ̀ ɓɛɓɛɛ̀, di a ronɗom ɓɔ; à fa ɓɔ ìtèɗ wulɛ ɓɛɛ nanaɓ ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay;
à siŋdɛ̀ngà ɓɔ lɛ, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ teɗ com ɓi rìkɛ̀ɛ̀; ɓɛɛ ɓanɛn kìgeŋ kɔrìkɔ kɛ̀ ɓɛɛ̀ teɗ bìrɛs, nsoò kaagh a ɓiɗilàg, nsoò mɔ̀ɔ̀ni, kɛ̀ ɓɛɛ̀ pìg ɓi ɓàm;
kìɓan kifɔg à kpaaghà lɛ: Waatɛɛna lɔŋ ɓɛ̀siripàs ɓi mɛ̀kòò, mum kɛɛ̀ ɓɔ̀ɓtɛn ɓilàà ɓiɓɛɛ̀.
Nni à kpaatìghà ɓɔ lɛ: Jàŋ bimiɗ ìnɛ ɓì kpaŋi, kɔ̀riina lɔŋ ɓi naa ìnɛ ɓì ɗiŋii miì, à kpaŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓì rì ɓiì pɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi jàŋ inɛ̀n.

I ɓɛ ɓeni mìni kì ghàɓi jàŋ idɛŋ, nsoò lɛ ɓɛ ɓeni kìwoògh com ki ɓi kpaakpàà, i ɓì ti ɓiì pɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi jàŋ inɛ̀n, ɓì kwìɗ kùrùɓu ànɛ mìni ɓi mɛ̀kòò, rìkì ɗiǹ ɗyɛɛ̀ rèresi ɓumɓɛ̀n zɛ̀ɗ yaà.
Nni ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ kɛngà, ɓɛ tum rìkpaa ɗi ɓum lɛ ɓɛɛ lɔɔ̀ghrɛn mɛ̀rem.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ nanàɓkà ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay lɛɛ̀gwey, ɓɛ ki wɔ̀ɔwɔɔ̀zì tì ɓɛ̀roroɓ di ɓɛ siŋii ɓɔ mɔ̀ɔ ɓi nyòò.

Nni rìfòm ɗi lɛ Eroodɛ ɗi wokà kìɓan kiǹ ɓisuulɛ rìkem ɗi Yeesus ɗi ɓaghà di ɗi ti ɓiì pàpasi ɓum jàŋ bimiɗ, ɓɛ kpaakpàà lɛ, Zyaŋ Bàɓtis yɛɛ ghemɓɛɛ yì a nyɔ̀ɛ̀y, kɛɛ̀ki à rì miì rì ìtèɗ wu kìkiyɛn dàm.
Ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ kpaakpàà lɛ Eli yɛɛ rì, ɓɛmbog lɛ à rì lɔŋ ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan à Bɛ̀ll yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan ɓɛmbog.
Yɛ̀ɛ Eroodɛ à wokà gɛ mɛ̀kali anɛ̀n bimiɗ, nni à kpaaghà lɛ: Zyaŋ ànɛ mɛ̀ɛ ǹɗeɓsii lɛ ɓɛɛ ren ǹto nnyɛɛ ghemɓɛɛ!
Lɛ Eroodɛ nyimiɗ yɛɛ faghà ìtèɗ wulɛ ɓɛɛ ɓan Zyaŋ, ɓɛ ki kàŋ nyi rì mɛ̀sɛ̀ŋi, ɓɛ pig ɓi naà-zày, ɓi kìɓan ki Eroɗyaadɛ à gili geni ànɛ lɛ Filiɓ ànɛ à tekà.
Zyaŋ à kpaakpaaghà Eroodɛ lɛ: Ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi lɛ u wɛs̀ gili goni.
Eroɗyaadɛ à takàkà Zyaŋ ɓi ɗùm, à ki kaakaa bee inɛ lɛ ɓɛɛ wey nyi, kìɓan kifog, kɛ̀ɛ ɓa ri bee,

lɛ Eroodɛ àa ǹnìgàg Zyaŋ, à ki kàmag ri nyi, lɛ à yighà lɛ Zyaŋ à ɓaghà saaɗ à mum, à ki ɓa ti ǹtɛnɛn ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll. Ɗyomzɛ̀n ɗi ǹti ɗi ɗimgì Eroodɛ cààmɛ̀n kìcèm ki à woogh ɓìtòkì ɓi Zyaŋ, kɔm̀ lɛ ki ǹkɔ̀ngì nyi lɛ a wowog ɓyɔ.

Wɔ̀lɛ ŋwosi mààgh à Eroɗyaadɛ à kpagà ɓi gòn ìnɛ Eroodɛ à ɓaghà ɓi kìsɔ̀g ki ɓi gòn i rìyalɛ̀n ɗìì; à taŋzɛ̀ngà kìsɛ̀nɛ̀, à reŋɗɛ̀n ɓɛ̀sasààgh ɓii, rì ɓɛ̀kɔ̀mɛ̀n-ɓɛ̀sujàà, rì ɓɛ̀lem ɓɛ ɓum ɓɛ a Galile.

Nni gɔ̀n ì Eroɗyaadɛ ì ɗiŋìghày ɓi naa ì kìsɛ̀nɛ̀, ì tum rìɗyen. Ì rɔɔ lɛ rì Eroodɛ, rì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà a kìsɛ̀nɛ̀. Rìfòm ɗì kali min ŋwutyàà gɔ̀n ànɛn lɛ: Tɔghà mɛ̀ com kìcèm ki ù kɔ̀ni ǹfa wɔ̀ kɔ.
Fɔɔnnɛ à kanɛ̀ngà bɛ̀ɗ, à kpaa nyi lɛ: Com kìcèm ki ù rì mɛ̀ ɓiì tɔɔgh nsoò kìlànà ki zi ìnɛ ǹlàmii kɛ yaa rì, ǹɗi wɔ̀ ɓiì faa kɔ.
Nni ŋwutyàà giɓ à kpagà ɓi dan à kɛ̀n kì tɔɔ̀gh jɛɛ lɛ: Cɛ kɛɛ̀ ki ntɔg, nni jɛɛ à ɓàkà nyi lɛ: Tɔghà ǹto wu Zyaŋ Bàɓtis.
À sugtìghày rì mɛ̀ree yɛ̀ɛ rifòm, à kpaa ɗyɔ lɛ: Nkɔ̀nkɔn lɛ u fa mɛ̀ nto wu Zyaŋ Bàɓtis ɓi taasà lɔŋ ɓigomìnɛ.
Rìfòm ɗi wokà bim, kìɓan kìfog ɗi ɓaghà ɓi lɛ ɗi ɓeǹ lɛ ɗi ɓaghà di ɗyaa kànag bɛ̀ɗ ɓi mis mɛ ɓumɓɛ ɗi reŋɗɛ̀ngà.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɗi ghaskà ki romì sujàà ɗi tɔg lɛ, a yuiy nyi rì nto wu Zyaŋ Bàɓtis.
Sujàà à kɛ̀ngà ɓi naà-zày à syaŋ ǹto wu Zyaŋ, à sugtìì rì wɔ ɓi taasà, a fa wɔ rì gɔ̀n ìnɛn, ì teɗ ì ceesì rì jɛɛ.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ Zyaŋ ɓɛ wokà ɓɔlɛ anɛ̀n, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ yughày kì terì kìloŋ kii, ɓɛ kɛǹ kɔ kì ɓòmi.
Ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom ɓɛ taŋzɛ̀ngà Yeesus a nyoo, ɓɛ kpaa nyi ɓìɓan ɓìcèm ɓi ɓɛ kighày, rì ɓi ɓɛ resàkày ɓum.

Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ: Yùuna, ti pyerɛn jàŋ ìnɛ ɓum ɓɛ yin, tì fɔɔ̀sɛn lɛsàg, ɓisuulɛ ɓum ɓɛ ɓaghà wɔɔ lɛɛ̀gwey, ɓɛ kikì lɛ, ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ kɛnkɛ̀n, ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ yuyùy lèg ànɛ lɛ, ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓi ri ɓee inɛ lɛ ɓɛ ɗi còm.
Nni Yeesus rì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ ɓɔkà ɓi kìkɔm lɛ ɓɛɛ pyerɛn, ɓi jàŋ ìnɛ ɓum ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓì.
Ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ ghɛngà ɓɔ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ kɛnkɛ̀ngà, ɓɛ ki rèmi lɛ ɓɔ yɛɛ ri; fɔɔnnɛ ɓum ɓɛ pɛɛ̀pɛ̀sɛ̀ngày ɓì bàn yìcèm, ɓɛ kɛɛ̀ghì rì tìfɔg, ɓɛ log ki kpaŋì ɓi jàŋ incèm rì ɓɔ.

Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à kpagày ɓi kìkɔm, à ghɛn coo gùl ì ɓum di ì ti, nyìighnyìg ì ki nyi rì ɓumɓɛ̀n, lɛ ɓɛ rɔɓkà fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ jɔ̀ɔ̀ yi yi ri kɛ̀ɛ̀ m̀ɓèŋì. Fɔɔnnɛ à tumɛ̀ngà ɓɔ rìrèsàg ɗi ɓiɓan lɛɛ̀gwey.
Yɛ̀ɛ ŋwos a ɓaghà di à tì lɛ a mag ɓìlɛy, ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛ tyoŋdɛ̀n nyi a nyoo, ɓɛ kpaa nyi lɛ: Jàŋ ìnɛ ì rì kilɛŋ, ŋwos a ki kɛ̀ɛ kì màagh ɓilɛ̀y;
kali ɓumɓɛ, ɓɛɛ kɛǹ ɓi bàn rì ɓi jɛ̀m i ɓilɔ̀ŋ ɓi ɓi wuɓsɛɛ, ɓɛɛ laàghrɛn yì ɓyom ɓi ɗiyɛn.
Yeesus à ɓàg ɓɔ lɛ: Mìniì ɓɔmiɗ faana ɓɔ ɓìɗilàg. Nni ɓɛ kpaaghà nyi lɛ: Tì rì nya ɓiì kɛ̀ɛ kì laàgh bìrɛs ì ɓɛtɔɔsìm rìtin lɛ ti fa ɓɔ ɓɛɛ ɗi.

Nni Yeesus à tɔkà ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓì rì foo rì bìrɛs yaŋ? Kɛ̀ɛna kì ghɛɛ̀. Ɓɛ ɓaghà lɛ ɓɛ mɛ kaa lɛ ɓɛɛ yi gàɓ ì ɓyom ìnɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà rì yɔ̀, nni ɓɛ ɓakà Yeesus lɛ: Tì rì rì bìrɛs yitaǹ rì ɓìzɛn ɓiɓɛɛ̀.
Yeesus à kpaa min ɓɔ lɛ ɓɛɛ kɔɔ̀si ɓum ɓɛ̀n ɓɛ̀cèm ɓi ɓyaaɓi ɓi cem ɓi ɓɔɔ ɓìtuu
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ kɔràkà ɓi zi, ɓi mɛ̀raŋ lɛ rì mɛ ɓum mɛ̀tin mɛtaǹ, rì mɛ ɓum mɛ̀tin mɛɓɛɛ̀ rì ǹtɛ̀ɗ.

Yeesus à teɗ kìtaǹ ki bìrɛs rì kìɓɛ̀ɛ̀rɛn ki ɓìzɛn, à ɓegsì mis aɗyoo, à fa Bɛ̀ll ɓìtògsɛ̀n, à ɓɛkì min bìrɛs yiǹ, a fa yɔ rì ɓɛ̀yilàg lɛ ɓɛɛ kaɓsi ɓum. A kàɓsàkà tì girig ɓɔɔ̀cèm ɓìzɛn ɓi kìɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓiǹ.
Ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɗighà ɓɛ wuràg.
Ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ taŋzɛ̀n lɛ rì ɓìɓɛghà ɓi bìrɛs rì ɓìzɛn ɓi ɓi rɔɓtàkà, ɓi ron ɓìkàɗ ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì ɓiɓɛɛ̀.
Bàlì ì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɗìghà bìrɛs ìnɛn ì ɓaghà ɓɛ̀tɔɔsìm ɓɛtaǹ.
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn, Yeesus a ghàskà kì losì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓɔg ɓi kìkɔm, ɓɛɛ log kìsyàa rì nyi cɛcɛɗ a Bɛdsayida, cààmɛ̀n ki nyii ka gheeghesɛ̀n ɓum lɛ ɓɛɛ sukì.
Yɛ̀ɛ à ghesɛ̀ngà ɓumɓɛ̀n, nni à kɛ̀ngà kì ɓɔ̀ŋzaagh ɓi dòn aɗyòò.
Cɛŋkò ki kpagà di kìkɔm ki ti ɓi nyìinyìm à rìɓày, wɔ̀lɛ Yeesus cɛ̀ncii yɛɛ ɓaghà di à kakày a cɛɗ.

Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à ghɛngà di ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛɛ̀ yeeghyeèghkɛ̀n ɓi rìfyèè ɗi riɓày lɛ bɛ̀ɓ ì ɓaghày ɓɔ asu, ì yeèyèèsì ɓɔ, nni à kɛ̀ngà ɓɔ a nyoo di ɓyom ɓi duri ɓi ti, à kɛ̀ɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀ yì ɓi mɛ̀nig aɗyòò; à mɛɛ ki kìghà lɛ a cee ɓɔ.
Nni yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ ghɛngà nyi di a kɛ̀ɛ̀kɛɛ yi fɔlɔɔ ɓi mɛ̀nig aɗyoo, ɓɛ fekì lɛ ɓɛ ghɛɛ nyɔ̀ɛ̀y, ɓɛ tumɛ̀n rìkugsɛ̀n.
Ɓisuulɛ ɓɔɔ̀cèm ɓɛ ghɛngà nyi, ki syaŋdì ɓɔ mɛ̀rem. Yeesus à ghàs kì tòòghrɛɛ à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Maasiina mɛ̀rem ɓi mùm, mɛ̀ yɛɛ ri, kɛ̀ ɓi risi.
Fɔɔnnɛ à ɓɔkà ɓi kìkɔm, bɛ̀ɓ ìnɛ ì kìkìghà ì maarɛ̀n; kìɓan kiǹ ki yag ɓɛ̀yilàg rìwog ìsuùcèm.
Ɓisuulɛ ɓɛ wokà ɓi azi ànɛ ɓi dàm ìnɛ Yeesus à kìghà, yɛ̀ɛ à tègsìghà bìrɛs, lɛ mɛ̀rem maa mɛ ɓaghà mɛ̀tèɗkakɛn.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ratɛ̀ngà kì syaà, ɓɛ kpaŋ ɓi kìlànà ki zi ki a Zyenezarɛt ɓɛ lomzì kìkɔm ɓi bèn ì rìɓày,
Lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ sɛngày ɓi kìkɔm, ɓum ɓɛ ghas kìrèmii Yeesus.
Ɓɛ tum rìkɛ̀ɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓi naa ɓi naa di ɓɛɛ̀, kpaakpaa ɓum lɛ Yeesus à ti fɛ; ɓɛ ki tɛ̀tɛg yi ɓɛ̀roroɓ ɓi ɓɛ̀kon, di ɓɛɛ̀, kɛ̀nkɛn ɗi ɓɔ ɓi jàŋ bimiɗ ìnɛ ɓɛ woogh lɛ Yeesus à rì.

Ɓi jàŋ yicèm yi Yeesus à kpagà à tumɛ̀n lɛ, ɓi ɓìlɔ̀ŋ, rì ɓi bàn nsoò lɛ ɓi jɛ̀m i ɓilɔ̀ŋ, ɓɛ ǹnɔ̀ŋzàg ɓɛ̀roroɓ ɓi jàŋ yi yɛ̀ɛ ɓìyan ɓi tyèè, ɓɛ ɓɔŋzì nyi lɛ, ɓɛ̀roroɓ ɓɛ̀n ɓɛɛ kom̀ lɔŋ nsoò rìkeɓ ɗii ɗi kilàà; fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ komgà nyi ɓɛ wɔngàkà.
Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ rì ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓɛ ɓɛ pɛsɛ̀ngày a Yorisalɛm ɓɛ taŋzɛ̀ngà Yeesus a nyòò,
ɓɛ ghɛn di ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛɛ ɗiɗi ɓyom, ɓyàg ri tìfin, yɛɛ lɔɔ lɛ, kɛ̀ɛ̀ kìsòo ɓyàg.
Kɔm̀ lɛ Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ rì Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ̀cèm ɓaa ɗi ɓi ɓiɗilàg di ɓɛ ka soò ɓi ɓyàg lɛ syeesyee, lɛ ɓɛɛ̀ ɓèŋɓeŋ kìsyɔ̀ɔ̀ ki ɓɛseŋi ɓaa.

Ɓɛ kilàg tì lɛ, ì ɓɛ sughiì fyèè, ɓɛ yin lɛ ɓɛ ɗi ɓìɗilàg di ɓɛ ka sogtɛn ɓi, yɛ̀ɛ kìsyɔ̀ɔ̀ ki righerɛ̀n ɗyaa kɛɛ̀ kɔ̀nkɔ̀n. Ɓɛ roodii tì rì ɓìcèlì ɓidɛŋ, fɛ lɛ yɛ̀ɛ rìsòò ɗi ɓɛɓeŋ, rì rìsòò ɗi bèè, ɗì rìsòò ɗì tìgheŋ ti bɔŋ.
Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ rì ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓɛ tɔkà Yeesus lɛ: Ɓisuucɛ nnɛ ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɔɔ ɓɛ kiì ɓi yɛ̀ɛ ɓìsyɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓi ɓɛseŋi ɓìs ɓyɛɛ kpaakpàà, yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛɛ̀ ɗiɗi ɓyom kɛ̀ɛ̀ kìsòo ɓyàg?

Nni Yeesus à ɓàkà ɓɔ lɛ: Mìni ɓum ɓɛ, fyɛɛ̀fyɛɛ̀ ɓi ŋwɔm ìghèy ɓi ɗùm, Ezayii à kpaaghà lɔŋ saaɗ ɓi kìɓan kin, fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ki rì kì kànɛn lɛ: Ɓumɓɛ ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki ɓɛɛ̀ ɓɔɔɓɔgsì lɔŋ mɛ ɓi ŋwɔm aɗyoo, mɛ̀rem maa mɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ wuɓsɛn mɛ;
ɓɛɛ̀ yooyogsì cààmɛ̀n kaa lɛ ɓɛɛ̀ ɓɔɔɓɔgsì mɛ̀, lɛ dɔgtɛ̀n yi ɓɛɛ̀ rèrèsì yi ri lɔŋ ɓisyɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓi ɓum.
Nni Yeesus à ɓɔ̀ɓtìghà lɛ: Ɓì càri ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Bɛ̀ll lɛ ɓìsyɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓi ɓum ɓyɛɛ̀ɓi ɓì foŋi ǹto miì!
À kpaatì ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓì naŋi ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Bɛ̀ll ɓisuu ɓisyɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓin!
Lɛ Moyis à kpaaghà lɛ: Mum a nyaàsi seŋi ɓɛɛ jɛɛ, rì tì lɛ ŋwaànɛ à nyɔ̀mɛɛ seŋi nsoò lɛ jɛɛ, à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ ɓɛ wey nyi.
Kìɓan kìfog mìnii ti ɓi kpaaghì lɛ: Ì ŋwaà kalii seŋi nsoò lɛ jɛɛ lɛ, gàɓ ì com ìnɛ màa rì lɛ ǹghɛɓsì wɔ̀ rì yɔ̀ ì rì kɔ̀rìɓaŋ. Yɛɛ lɔɔ lɛ com ki ɓɛ mɛ pègsɛn lɛ ɓɛɛ cogtɛn Bɛ̀ll,
i mum à kpaa fɔlɔɔ, mìnii càɗ nyi lɛ kɛ̀ɛ ghɛɓsi ti seŋi, nsoò lɛ jɛɛ.
Fɔlɔɔ anɛ̀n à rì yɛɛ lɔɔ lɛ, ɓi yooyogsì jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll rì ɓìsyɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓin ɓi ɓyaà ceècèèsɛ̀n; ɓi ki ti ɓì kìlàg tì ɓìɓan ɓidɛŋ lɛɛ̀gwey fɔlɔɔ yɛ̀ɛ ɓiǹ.
Nni Yeesus à reŋìghà tì gùl ì ɓum, à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Mìniìcèm ramina mɛ̀reè, ɓi wog com ki ǹkpaakpaa minì.
Com kìcèm ki mum à ɗii ki kɛǹ nyi ɓi ɗùm ki yin lɛ ki foŋ nyi kìsyeg ɓi nyòò; kìɓan kifog com ki ki pɛsɛɛ yì mum ɓi ɗùm, kɛɛ ri lɛ ki foŋ nyi kìsyeg ɓi nyòò.
Ŋwaànɛ à rì rì mɛ̀reè, mɛ lɛ à wog, à wog.
Yɛ̀ɛ à ɗiŋìghà ɓi naa, gwìy yɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ wuɓsɛn tì nyi, nni ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛ tɔkà nyi azi anɛ ɓi dàɗkì ìnɛn.
À kalì ɓɔ lɛ: Mìni girig ɓi rì yɛɛ lɔɔ kɛ̀ɛ̀ ɗyomzɛ̀n yɛ̀ɛ ɓi woogh ɓi lɛ, com kìcèm ki mum à ɗii, ki kɛǹ nyì ɓi ɗùm ki yin lɛ ki foŋ nyi kìsyeg ɓi nyòò;
ɓisuulɛ com kiŋcèm kì yin nyi ɓiì kɛ̀nkɛni ɓi ǹɗem, kɛɛ̀ kɛ̀nkɛn lɔŋ nyi ɓi ɗùm, ki sɛn, ki kpaŋ di à kɛ̀ɛ cog. Yeesus à kpaaghà yɛɛ lɔɔ lɛ ɓìɗilàg ɓìcèm ɓi rì kɛ̀ɛ̀ kìsyeg.
À kpaatìghà lɛ: Com ki ki kpaŋiì ɓi mum kɛɛ ri lɛ ki foŋ nyi kìsyèg ɓi nyoo,
ɓisuulɛ lɔŋ ɓi ɗùm ɗì mum rì ɓi ǹɗem wii nnɛ ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛyitì, rì rìɓàmɓà, rì wii, rì ǹwolɛ̀n,
rì tìsɔ̀mɔ̀g, rì kìsee ki ikum, rì kìɓeɓtàg ki ǹɗem, rì mɛ̀ghèy, rì kìɓùùsì, rì m̀mììghrɛ̀n, rì tìfena rì kalɛn, rì kìyèg ki ɗyomzɛ̀n ɓi ti ɓi ɓalàg yì.
Ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓiɓan ɓyɛɛ̀ ɓalag yi mum ɓi ǹɗem, ɓi ki fogi nyi kìsyeg ɓi nyòò.

Yeesus à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà ɓì jàŋ inɛ̀n à kɛ̀n ɓi kìlànà ki zi ki bàn ì Tiir ì ɓaghà wɔɔ. Fɔɔnnɛ à kɔ̀rìghà a mɛɛ mɛdɛŋ, lɛ à kɔ̀ngà ɓì lɛ ɓɛɛ yi lɛ à rì wɔɔ, kìɓan kifog à ɓaghà ɓi lɛ à kɔ̀rì nyamzɛn.
Ɓisuulɛ giɓ adɛŋ ànɛ gɔ̀n yìì ì ɓaghà rì kìɓeɓtàg kì nghay, a wokày Yeesus ɓi rìkem, à yù nyi kì kpìi a mɛ̀kòò;
giɓ ancèm ànɛn à ɓaghà ǹkèn a giɓ, a yalɛ̀ngà a Fenisii, ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Sirii, à tɔkà Yeesus lɛ a naɓ kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay ki gɔ̀n yìì ì ɓaghà rì kɔ.
Yeesus à ɓàg nyi lɛ: Ka càra ɓɔɓti ɓɛɛ ɗi ɓɛɛ wuri, lɛ ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi lɛ ɓɛɛ teɗ ɓìɗilàg ɓi ɓɔɓti, ɓɛɛ fa rì ɓɔn ɓɛ bu.
Giɓ anɛ̀n à pɛ̀ɛ̀zì nyi lɛ: Ɛ̀ɛ̀ Kan! ù kalii miì, wɔ̀lɛ, ɓɔn ɓɛ bu ɓɛɛ̀ ɗilag bubùɓ yi ɓɔɓti ɓɛ raàsii a teɓèrè zi.
Yeesus à kpaa min nyi lɛ: Ɓì jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ ù kpaa ìnɛ̀n, kɛ̀na, kìɓeɓtàg ki ǹghay ki pɛsɛɛ gɔ̀n yɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓi nyòò.
Yɛ̀ɛ̀ à sukà, à tanɛ̀n gɔ̀n yìì ǹnɔ̀nɔŋiyɛn ɓi ɓyomɓilɔ̀ŋ, ɗi kìɓeɓtàg ki ǹghay ki mɛ pɛ̀sɛn yɔ̀ ɓi nyòò.
Yeesus à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà ɓi kìlànà ki zi ki bàn ì Tiir ì ɓaghà wɔɔ à fyee à Sidɔŋ, a syàà kìlɔ̀ŋ ki bàn ǹtɛ̀ɗ lɛ a sugti ɓi bèn ì rìɓày ànɛ a Galile.
Ɓɛ yughày nyi rì lɔlɔg adɛŋ ànɛ à yighà ɓi ritòòghrɛ̀n, ɓɛ ɓɔŋzàg nyi lɛ a saagh ŋwaànɛ̀n ɓyàg ɓi nyòò.
Yeesus à tekà ŋwaànɛ̀n à kɛ̀n ɗi nyi daŋdarààŋ, à ràɓsɛ̀n ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà wɔɔ, à purì nyi ɓɔn ì ɓyàg ɓi mɛ̀reè, à ki teɗ tityɛɛ tii, à kòm rìlemàg ɗi ŋwaànɛ̀n miì.
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn, nni à ɓegsìghà mis aɗyoo, à fɛmzɛ̀n, à kpaa lɛ: Èfata! Yɛɛ lɔɔ lɛ, ŋwàrɛn.
Fɔɔnnɛ mɛ̀reè mɛ ŋwaànɛ̀n mɛ ghaskà kì ŋwàrɛɛ, rìlemàg ɗii ɗi fumɓɛ̀n, à tumɛ̀n rìtòtòg lɛ tɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n.
Yeesus à rɔ̀gsɛ̀ngà ɓɔ lɛ ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ kpaa mum kìɓan kiǹ, kìɓan kifog, ɓɔɔ kikìghà lɛ, di Yeesus a rɔ̀gsɛ̀n ɓɔ fɔlɔɔ, di ɓɔɔ̀ sààti ɓɔlɛ.
Ɓum ɓɛ kuuràkà lɛɛ̀gwey, ɓɛ ki kpaakpaa lɛ: Ɓìɓan ɓìcèm ɓi a kìkì ɓi ri lɛ syeesyee. A kìki lɛ, ɓɛ̀lɔlɔg ɓɛɛ woòghrɛn, ɓɛ̀mùm-mùm ɓɛ toòghrɛ̀n.
Ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ̀n yɛ̀ɛ coo gùl ì ɓum ì taŋzɛ̀ngà, yɔ̀ kɛ̀ɛ̀ com kìɗiyɛn, nni Yeesus à reŋìghà ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii, à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ:
Nyìighnyìg ì kìi mɛ̀ rì gùl ìnɛ ɓisuulɛ mɛ̀ru mɛɛ ti lɛ mɛraa, yɛ̀ɛ tì rì nɗaŋ ɗi ɓumɓɛ, ɓɛ ki yiìdi ri com ki lɛ ɓɛ ɗi.
I ǹki kpaa ɓɔ lɛ ɓɛɛ suki a ɓɛ̀mɛɛ ɓaa yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ri lɛ zày, ɓɛ ri ɓiì kpìi zày ɓi bee, ɓisuulɛ ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɓi ɓɔ ɓɛ m̀pɛ̀saagh yì tìràɓ.
Nni ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛ ɓakà nyi lɛ: Fe nnɛ tì rì ɓiì terìì ɓìɗilàg ɓi lɛ ti fa ɓɔ, ɓɛ ɗi ɓɛ wuràg ɓi kìlɛŋ ki jàŋ ki?
Yeesus à tɔg ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓì rì foo ri bìrɛs yaŋ? Ɓɛ ɓàg nyi lɛ: Tì rì fɛ rì bìrɛs taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀.

Fɔɔnnɛ à kpaaghà min gùl ì ɓum ìnɛ̀n lɛ, yɛ̀ɛ kɔri ɓi zi, à teɗ kìtaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ki bìrɛs, à ka fa Bɛ̀ll ɓìtògsɛ̀n, à ɓɛkì min yɔ à fa rì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii lɛ ɓɛɛ kàɓsag; ɓɛ̀roɓɛ̀n ɓɛ kaɓsàg bìrɛs ìnɛ̀n rì gùl ìnɛn.
Ɓɛ ɓatìghà rì ɓɔɔ ɓìzɛn, nni Yeesus à fatìghà Bɛ̀ll ɓìtògsɛ̀n ɓisuu ɓìzɛn ɓìn, à kpaatì lɔŋ ɓɛ̀yilàg lɛ ɓɛɛ kaɓsag tì ɓìzɛn ɓìn rì gùl ì ɓum ìnɛ̀n.
Ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ ɗighà ɓɛ wuràg, nni ɓìɓɛghà ɓi ɓi rɔɓtàkà ɓi rongà ɓìkàɗ taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀.
Ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓaghà nunùg ɓum ɓɛ̀tɔɔsìm ɓɛnin. Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn nnɛ Yeesus à ghesɛ̀ngà ɓɔ, à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ, ɓɛɛ sukì.
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à ghàskà kì ɓɔɔ̀gh ɓi kìkɔm rì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii, à kɛ̀n ɓi kìlànà ki zi ki a Dalmanutà.
Nni Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ peeghày ɓɛ tumɛn rìnyoònyòlɛ̀n rì Yeesus, ɓɛ tɔg nyi kìrèmzɛnà ki dàm ki ki resii lɛ ìtèɗ wii wu pɛsɛɛ yì yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll. Ɓɛ tɔkà fɔlɔɔ lɛ ɓɛɛ feèghrɛn nyi.
Nni Yeesus à fɛmzɛ̀ngà rì ìtèɗ à kpaa lɛ: Ɓisuucɛ nnɛ bɔ̀ɓ i ɓum ìnɛ yɛ̀ɛ tɔtɔg mɛ lɛ ǹki kìrèmzɛnà ki dàm? Ǹkalii mìni ɓi saaɗ lɛ, ɓyàa ghɛn ɓi kìrèmzɛnà ki dàm nsoò kìfog.
Fɔɔnnɛ à càɗkà ɓɔ foo, à ɓɔgtì ɓi kìkɔm lɛ a syaà cɛcɛɗ kimbog.
Ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ ɗimzɛ̀ngà rìteɗ ɗi bìrɛs, lɔŋ bìrɛs bog yɛ̀ɛnɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà rì yɔ̀ ɓi kìkɔm.
Nni Yeesus à siŋdɛ̀ngà ɓɔ, à kpaa lɛ: Konaaghna syeesyee à rìkonàg lɛ rì nwìɗ a Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ rì à Eroodɛ.
Ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ tum rìnyoònyòlɛ̀n wɔɔ ɓɔ rì ɓɔ ɓisuulɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓi ri bìrɛs.

Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à wokà di ɓɛɛ nyoonyolɛ̀n fɔlɔɔ, nni à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓisuucɛ nnɛ ɓi nyoonyolɛ̀n di ɓi kpaakpaa lɛ, à kpaa fɔlɔɔ lɛ, yɛ̀ɛ tì yin ɗi bìrɛs? Yɛɛ lɔɔ lɛ ɓì ka wog ɓi, kɛ̀ ɓi ki yi wa?
Mɛ̀rem min mɛ rì mɛ̀ tèɗkakɛn? Ɓì rì lɛ, mìni rì mis, kɛ̀ ɓì ghɛnɛn, mìni rì mɛ̀reè, kɛ̀ ɓì wooghrɛn? Ɓi ɗimzɛɛ nya
yɛ̀ɛ m̀ɓɛkàkà bìrɛs yitaǹ ɓisuu ɓum ɓɛ̀tɔɔsìm ɓɛtaǹ, ìnɛ ì rɔ̀ɓkà ì rongà ɓìkàɗ ɓyaŋ? Ɓɛ ɓaàg lɛ: Ɓìkàɗ ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì ɓiɓɛɛ̀.
Yɛ̀ɛ m̀ɓɛkàkà bìrɛs taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓisuu ɓum ɓɛ̀tɔɔsìm ɓɛnin, ìnɛ ì rɔ̀ɓkà ì rongà ɓìkàɗ ɓyaŋ? Ɓɛ ɓaàg lɛ: Taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀.
Nni à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓì ka wog ɓì lɔŋ wa?
Yeesus rì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛ kɛngà a Bɛdsayida, ɓum ɓɛ yuiy nyi rì ɗyaŋɗyàŋ àdɛŋ, ɓɛ ɓɔŋzàg nyi lɛ a kom̀ ŋwaàncèm nsoò ǹkòmɛn.

Yeesus à ɓan ɗyaŋɗyàŋ ànɛ̀n ɓi càg, à pɛ̀sɛ̀n ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ kiǹ à kɛ̀n rì nyi fìràɓ; fɔɔnnɛ à fogà nyi tìtyɛɛ̀ ɓì mis à ɓaàtì nyi ɓyàg ɓì mis, à tɔg nyi lɛ: Ù tì lɛ ù ghɛnɛ̀n gàɓ?
Nni ɗyaŋɗyàŋ à ŋwàɗkà mis, à kpaa Yeesus lɛ: Nseesee ɓum, wɔ̀lɛ nseesee ɓɔ yɛ̀ɛ ɓìte, ɓɛ ki kɛ̀ɛ̀kɛɛ.
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à ɓaatìghà tì nyi ɓyàg ɓi mis, yɛ̀ɛ ɗyaŋɗyàŋ à pɛɓsɛ̀ngà tì lɛ fyɛɛyi, à konàg kì ghɛɛ lɛ à mɛ wɔ̀n, à ki yi rìghasì ɗi ɓyom ɓìcèm ɓi a seesèè.
Yeesus à ghesɛ̀n min nyi lɛ a sug a mɛɛ mii, à kpaa nyi lɛ: Kɔ̀ɔ sugti ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ.
Nni Yeesus à kɛ̀ngà rì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓi ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓi ɓi wuɓsɛɛ bàn ìnɛ lɛ Sezare à Filiɓ; fɔɔnnɛ à tɔkà ɓɔ ɓi bee lɛ: Ɓum ɓɛ ti ɓɛ kpaaghi ɓà lɛ mɛ ǹɗì ghɛn?
Nni ɓɛ ɓakà nyi lɛ: Ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛɛ̀ kpaaghi lɛ wɔ̀ɔ̀ rì Zyaŋ Bàɓtis, ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛmbog lɛ wɔ̀ɔ̀ rì Eli, ɓɛmbog tì lɛ wɔ̀ɔ̀ rì kìbog ki ɓi ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan.
Nni Yeesus à tɔgtìghà ɓɔ lɛ: Mìniìɓɔmiɗ, ɓi kalag lɛ mɛ̀ ǹɗì ghɛn? Nni Pyɛɛri à ɓakà nyi lɛ: Ù rì Kiris.
Yeesus à rɔ̀gsɛ̀ngà ɓɔ syeesyee à rìrɔ̀gsɛ̀n lɛ, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ kpaa ŋwaàdɛŋ rìkuu ɗi mum ɗi à rì.

Nni à tumɛ̀ngà ɓɔ rìrèsì lɛ: Ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ, Man à mum a wog mɛ̀tɔɓ lɛɛ̀gwey, ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ kilɔ̀ŋ rì ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey, rì ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓɛɛ mag nyi, ɓɛ wey nyi, à ki ghèmɓɛn ajɛ̀m ì mɛ̀ru mɛraa.
À kpaakpààghà ɓìɓan ɓiǹ lɛ tɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n. Fɔɔnnɛ Pyɛɛri à tekà nyi a dwìɗ, à tumɛn nyi rìreɓ.

Nni Yeesus à ɓɛ̀ŋmɛ̀ngày ajɛ̀m à ghɛn ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii, à tumɛ̀n rìfwààdɛ̀n ɗi Pyɛɛri di a kpaakpaa lɛ: Pɛ̀sɛn mɛ̀ ajɛ̀m Satàn, ɓisuulɛ, mɛ̀yitì mɔɔ mɛ yin mɛ̀yitì mɛ Bɛ̀ll, mɛ rì lɔŋ mɛyitì mɛ ɓum.
Nni à reŋìghà min lɛ rì gùl ì ɓum rì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: I mum à kɔ̀ni lɛ a nɔɔ̀ti mɛ̀, à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì roòzɛɛ nyimiɗ, à tɛ̀gsɛ̀n kɔrɔs wìì, fɔɔnnɛ à nɔ̀ɔ̀tì mɛ̀.
Ɓisuulɛ mum ǹcèm ànɛ à ɓiì kɔ̀ni lɛ a kamɛ̀n rì cɛɓ kii, à rì kɔ ɓiì ɗimzii, wɔ̀lɛ ŋwaànɛ à rì ɓiì ɗimzii cɛɓ kii ɓisu wɛ̀m, rì ɓisuu Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ, nnyɛɛ ri kɔ ɓiì ghɛɓsii.
Kì ghɛɓsii mum cɛ lɛ, a fɔǹ ziinɛ bimiɗ, di à ɗimzii cɛɓ kii?
Ŋwaà rì lɛ à kwèɗ cɛɓ kii ri cɛ?

Ɓisuulɛ, ŋwaànɛ à rì mɛ̀ ɓiì woògh ǹtoòrìɗ, nsoò lɛ à wog ɓìɓan ɓyɛm̀ ǹtoòrìɗ ɓi gbàà ì ɓum ì gɛɛ̀nɛ, ìnɛ ì rì ɓɛ̀kìì-kìɓe rì ɓɛ̀kìì-tìsɔ̀mɔ̀g, Man à mum à woogh gɛ girig nyi ǹtoòrìɗ, ŋwos anɛ à yùu gɛ ɓi rìkem ɗi Seŋi wìì, ǹɗaŋ ri ɓum ɓii ɓɛ titom ɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀tɛnɛn.
Yeesus à faa ɓum ɓɛ̀tɔɔsìm ɓɛnin ɓìɗilàg
Nni à kpaatìghà ɓɔ lɛ: Ǹkalii mìni ɓi saaɗ lɛ gàɓ ì ɓum ìdɛŋ ìnɛ ɓi ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ rì fɛ, yàa wu ɓi di ì ka ghɛn ɓi yɛ̀ɛ kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll ki yùu yì rì ìtèɗ.
Ajɛ̀m ì mɛ̀ru taàfog, Yeesus à tekà lɛ, rì Pyɛɛri, rì Zyag, rì Zyaŋ, à kɛ̀n rì ɓɔ cɛ̀ncaa ɓi coo dòn aɗyoo, à lɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛ̀n ɓɔ ɓi mis dɛŋ.
Ɓìlàà ɓii ɓi lɔɔ̀ghrɛ̀ngà ɓìpuɓ ɓi lonlòm lɛ syaŋ̀syaŋ̀, lèg ànɛ ŋwaàdɛŋ ànɛ ɓi ziinɛ à yin lɛ à puɓsì ɓìlàà fɔlɔɔ.
Ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ ghɛn di Moyis rì Eli ɓɛ ti ɓiì tòtoogh ri Yeesus.
Nni Pyɛɛri à pɛ̀sìghà jɛ̀ɛ̀ à kpaa Yeesus lɛ: Raɓì, ki ri kìrɔɔ di tì kɔ̀rii fɛ̀, tì toŋ ɓìlaa ɓiraa lɛ, kifog ɓisu wɔɔ, kìfog ɓisuu Moyis, kìfog ɓisuu Eli.
A yighà ɓì com ki a kpaà, lɛ ìris wu ɓangà ɓɔɔ̀cèm.
Fɔɔnnɛ kìkwìɗ ki sigtɛ̀ngà ɓɔ, jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì ki kpaŋ yi ɓi kìkwìɗ kiǹ lɛ: Roànɛ à rì man wɛm̀ ànɛ ǹkeesàg, wooghna nyi.
Lɔŋ ɓi cààmɛ̀n kɔm̀ kiǹ ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ mɛɛ̀ kɛ̀ɛ̀sìghà tì mis fɛlɛ asu waa ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ghɛɛ̀di ŋwaàdɛŋ, lɔŋ Yeesus cɛ̀ncii nnɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà rì nyi.
Nni yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ sɛnsɛ̀ngày dòn, Yeesus à rɔ̀gsɛ̀n ɓɔ lɛ, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ kpaa mum com ki ɓaa ghɛɛ̀, à kpaŋ yɛ̀ɛ Man à mum à ri ghèmɓɛn a ɓìloŋ.
Ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ ɓegà jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛn ɓi mɛ̀rem, ɓɛ ki nyoonyolɛ̀n wɔɔ ɓɔ rì ɓɔ, di ɓɛɛ tɔɔtɔɔ̀ghrɛ̀n lɛ, rìghèmɓɛ̀n ɗi a ɓìloŋ ɗi ri yɛɛ lɔɔ lɛ cɛ?
Nni ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ tɔkà Yeesus lɛ: Ɓisuucɛ nnɛ ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓɛ ti ɓɛ kpaaghì lɛ, Eli à ka rì ɓiì yùu?
Yeesus à ɓàg ɓɔ lɛ: Eli à rì lɔŋ ɓiì loògh kì yùu lɛ a pegsag ɓìɓan ɓìcèm, nni lannɛ ki ri kì kànɛn lɛ Man à mum à ɓiì woògh mɛ̀tɔɓ lɛɛ̀gwey, ɓɛ ki sɛɛti nyi?
Wɔ̀lɛ Eli à yùghà, ɓɛ ki kì rì nyi yɛ̀ɛ ki kɔngà ɓɔ lɛ ɓɛɛ ki, lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ki ri kì kànɛn ɓì ɓɛg wìì.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ kpagà jàŋbog rì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ ghɛn di coo gwìy ì ɓum ì kɔ̀mi ɓɔ, ɓɛ ki nyoonyolɛ̀n rì ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna.
Lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ gùl ì ɓum ìnɛ̀n ì soɓkà mis ɓi Yeesus, ì mughìì rì mɛ̀ree lɛ yɛ̀ɛ yu nyi kì tògsii.
Yeesus à tɔkà ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓi nyoonyolɛ̀n rì ɓɔ ɓi kìɓan aɗì?
Fɔɔnnɛ ŋwaàdɛŋ ànɛ à ɓaghà ɓi kìtuu ki ɓum kìn, à ɓàkà nyi lɛ: Ǹɗèsàg, màa yùu yì rì ŋwɔɓti wɛ̀m à baŋì a lɔ̀ŋkɔɔ. À rì rì kìɓeɓtàg kì ǹghay ki ki pɛɛ̀zii nyi mùm-mùm.

Jàŋbimiɗ ìnɛ ki sɛni ɓi nyi, ki roŋ nyi ɓi zi, ŋwɔɓti à fuùfùùsì tìtyɛɛ̀ di a ŋàaŋaàdì min, à nàrɛ̀n lɛ saɗ-sààɗ. Màa ɓɔ̀ŋzaagh ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɔɔ lɛ ɓɛɛ naàɓ kìɓeɓtàg ki ǹghay kiŋcèm, kìɓan kifog kaa yaagh ɓɔ rìnàɓ.
Nni Yeesus à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ: Mìni boo ì ɓum ìnɛ, ì rì kɛ̀ɛ̀ rìgherɛ̀n, ǹɗì ɓiì kɔ̀rii ǹɗaŋ ri mìni à kpaŋ fin? Ǹki rì mìni ɓiì cenɛɛ à kpaŋ fe? Yùunay mɛ̀ fɛ rì ŋwɔɓti àncèm.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ yughày rì nyi; lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ŋwɔɓti à rogà mis ɓi Yeesus, kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay ki ghas nyi kì nàrii, à kpì ɓi zi, à sɛɛ̀sɛ̀gɛ̀rɛ̀n di a fuufuùsì tìtyɛɛ̀.
Yeesus à tɔg min seŋi ŋwɔɓti ànɛ̀n lɛ: Ki mɛ finɛn yɛ̀ɛ com ki ki tumɛ̀ngà nyi? Roànɛ̀n à ɓàg lɛ: Ki tumɛ̀ngà nyi lɔŋ ɓi rìŋwɔɓtì.
Ɓyààmɛ̀n lɛɛ̀gwey, kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay ki ti ki ɓokì nyi ɓi ɗuu nsoò lɛ ɓi mɛ̀nig lɛ kɛɛ wey nyi. Nni i ù rì lɛ ù kì com kìdɛŋ ɓisu wii, ghɛɓsi ɓìsi, wogha ɓà ɓisi nyìighnyìg.
Yeesus à ɓàg ŋwaànɛ̀n lɛ: U kpaaghi mɛ lɛ i ù rì lɛ ù kì com kidɛŋ, lɛ wɔ̀ɔ̀ yii ɓi lɛ kìɓan ki ki ri lɛ ki yaaghrɛ̀n di ŋwaà rì rì rìgherɛ̀n ki yin?
Fɔɔnnɛ seŋì ŋwɔɓtì ànɛ̀n à ghàskà kì kpaa jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: Ǹgherɛɛ! Yu ɓà mɛ kì ghɛɓsii ɓi rìɓa ɗi lɛ ɗì kɛ̀ɛ̀ rìgherɛ̀n.

Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à ghɛngà di ɓum ɓɛ ti ɓiì sùusuùrɛ̀n yì rì mɛ̀ree, nni à fwààdɛ̀ngà kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay à kpaa kɔ lɛ: Kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay ki ki tì ki pɛɛzàg ɓum ɓɛ̀lɔlɔg rì ɓɛ̀mùm-mùm, ǹkalii wɔ̀ lɛ, kpaŋa ɓi ŋwutyàànɛ, kɔ̀ɔ ki ɓììti ti kì ɗiŋii ɓi nyi.
Nni kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay ki ɓokà ŋwɔɓti ɓi zi rì ìtèɗ, ki faŋì di kɛɛ̀ kuukugsɛ̀n, ŋwutyàà mààghràg yɛ̀ɛ kìloŋ, ɓi lèg ànɛ lɛ ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ fefèkà lɛ à wii.
Wɔ̀lɛ Yeesus à ɓangà nyi ɓi càg, à pɛ̀sì nyi aɗyoo, ŋwutyàà ki rɛli mɛrɛ̀y.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à ɗiŋìghà ɓi naa, nni ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛ tɔkà nyi di ɓaa rɔ̀ɓ ɓɔ rì ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓisuucɛ nnɛ kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay kìn kaa yaagh ɓìsi rìnàɓ?
Yeesus à ɓàg ɓɔ lɛ: Lɔŋ bɔŋ̀zɛ̀n yɛ̀ɛti ì kìlàg lɛ rìkuu ɗi nghay ɗìn ɗyɛɛ kpaŋ.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus rì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛ pɛsɛ̀ngà foo, ɓɛ syaà ziì Galile, ki kɔngà ɓi Yeesus lɛ ɓum ɓɛɛ yi lɛ, à rì ɓi jaŋ̀ inɛ̀n;
ɓisuulɛ à rèrèsìghà ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓiɓan, à kpaakpàà ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓɛ ɓiì ɓanì Man à mum, ɓɛ fa rì ɓum, ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ wey nyi; wɔ̀lɛ à ɓiì ghèmɓɛɛ ajɛ̀m ì mɛ̀ru mɛraa.
Kìɓan kifog ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ yìghà ɓi azi anɛ ɓi jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ à kpaaghà ìnɛn, ɓɛ ki risi nyi rìtɔg.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ kɛngà kì kpaŋì a Kapɛrinawum, yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à ɗiŋìghà ɓi naa, nni à tɔkà ɓɛ̀yilàg lɛ: Cɛ ɓyàa nyoonyòlɛ̀n miì bee bimiɗ?
Wɔ̀lɛ ɓɛ minɛ̀n nyi, ɓisuulɛ ɓɛ kaàkàrɛ̀ngà jɛ̀ɛ̀ lɛ ɓɛɛ yi ghɛn anɛ ɓi ɓɔ yɛɛ cee ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛmbog.

Nni Yeesus à kɔ̀rìghà ɓi zi, à reŋì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì ɓɛɓɛɛ̀, à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: I mum à kɔ̀ni lɛ à ɓa ǹɗɛ̀lì-asù, a terɛn nyimiɗ yɛ̀ɛ siitòn à mum ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm, à ki ɓa ǹkìì-kìsay a ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm.
Nni à tekà maa ŋwɔɓti, à rɛsì ɓɔ nyi ɓi nyìinyìm à lɔ̀ɛ̀ɗ nyi à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ:
Mum ǹcèm ànɛ à ghàɓi maa ŋwɔɓti yɛ̀ɛ ànɛ rì kìnyàà ɓisu wɛ̀m a yi lɛ mɛ̀ɛmiɗ nnɛ à ghàɓi; nni ŋwaànɛ à ghàɓi mɛ̀, a yi lɛ, àa mɛ̀ nnɛ à ghàɓi, à ghàɓi ŋwaànɛ à romgày mɛ̀.
Nni Zyaŋ à kpaaghà Yeesus lɛ: Ǹɗèsàg, tyàa ghɛɛ di ŋwaàdɛŋ a nànaɓ ɓiɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay rì ɗii ɗyɔɔ, nni tyàa rèegh nyi lɛ kɛ̀ɛ kìki fɔlɔɔ, lɛ à ti kɛ̀ɛ ɓa ɓi nɗaŋ wis.
Nni Yeesus à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ: Kɛ̀ ɓi règ nyi, ɓisuulɛ mum ànɛ à kìi dàm rì ɗii ɗyɛ̀m, à yin lɛ à tumɛ̀n lɔŋ mɛ rìtòtòg ɗi kiɓe lɔŋ wɔɔ foo.
Ɓisuulɛ ŋwaànɛ à yin ɓiì ɗùùɗuu ri ɓìsi, à rì ɓi gàm yìs.
Ǹkalii mìni ɓi saaɗ lɛ: Ŋwaànɛ à rì mìni ɓiì faà gìras ì mɛ̀nig mɛnɔyɛn lɛ ɓìrì ɓum ɓɛ Kiris, àa mɛ̀m ɓi mɛlèɓ mɛ miì.
Wɔ̀lɛ i mum à kɛ̀ɓtii kìbog ki ɓi ɓɔɔɓɔɓti ɓɛ ɓɛ gherɛɛ mɛ̀ ɓɛ fiɓàg, ki ɓa tì kìrɔɔ lɛ ɓɛɛ suŋ nyi coo gɔ̀g ì kìpɛn ɓi kìmììgh, di ɓɛɛ pig nyi ɓi rìɓày à kìkòn.
I càg kɔɔ kɛɛ ri lɛ kɛɛ kɛɓti wɔ̀ fìɓàg, rena kɔ, lɛ ki ri wɔ̀ kìrɔɔ lɛ u ghɛn cɛɓ di ù rì càg kìfog à cee lɛ u kɛǹ ɓi kìgɛ̀ŋ ki ɗuu ɗi fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀ rì ɓyàg ɓyɔɔ ɓìcèm. [
Jaŋ ìnɛ zyèɗ yi ti yɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ wu, ɗuu ɗyɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɗimi.]
I ìkòò wɔɔ wɛɛ ri lɛ wɛɛ kɛɓti wɔ̀ fìɓàg rena wɔ, lɛ ki rì wɔ̀ kìrɔɔ lɛ u ghɛǹ cɛɓ di ù rì ìkòò wufog à cee lɛ u kɛǹ ɓi kìgɛ̀ŋ ki ɗuu ɗi fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀ rì mɛ̀kòò mɔɔ mɛcèm, [
jàŋ ìnɛ zyèɗ yi ti yɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ wu, ɗuu ɗyɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɗimi.]

I ɗis ɗyɔɔ ɗyɛɛ ri lɛ ɗyɛɛ kɛɓti wɔ̀ fìɓàg, sɔgha ɗyɔ, lɛ ki ri wɔ̀ kìrɔɔ lɛ u ɗiŋi ɓì kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll ɗi ù rì rì fìɗyaŋ à cee lɛ u kɛǹ ɓi kìgɛ̀ŋ ki ɗuu ɗi fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀ rì mis mɔɔ mɛcèm,
jàŋ inɛ zyèɗ yi tì yɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ wu, ɗuu ɗyɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɗimi.
Ɓisuulɛ mum bimiɗ à ɓiì ɓaà rì kìkòn ɓi nyoo lɛ ɗuu.
Nni Yeesus à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà foo lɛ a kɛǹ a Zyude, à kì syàà Zyuridɛŋ. Ɓìtuu ɓi ɓum ɓi taŋzɛ̀ngà tì nyi a nyoo, à tumɛ̀n tì ɓɔ rìrèsàg lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ àa ǹti à kìlàg.
Fɔɔnnɛ Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ yughà nyi kìfèèghrɛɛ, ɓɛ tɔg nyi lɛ: Ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓis ɓi gherɛɛ nya lɛ mum à rì lɛ à nàɓ giɓ wiì?
Nni Yeesus à ɓàkà ɓɔ lɛ: Moyis à kalìghà mìni lɛ ɓi kilag la?
Ɓɔɔ ɓaàg nyi lɛ: Moyis à gherɛ̀ngà lɛ baŋì yɛ̀ɛ falag giy kaàtà ànɛ lɛ a ghasɛɛ rì nyi, fɔɔnnɛ ì ki nàɓ min nyi.
Nni Yeesus à ɓàkà ɓɔ lɛ: Moyis à kpaaghà fɔlɔɔ ɓisuulɛ ɓì tèri mɛ̀rem.
Wɔ̀lɛ a rìtumɛ̀n, yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll à kìghà ɓyom ɓìcèm, à kìghà lɛ, rì baŋì rì giɓ;
kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki baŋì ì ɓiì càriì lɛ rì seŋi rì jɛɛ, ì ràrɛ̀n ɓɛɛ giy;
kìɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ki ɓum ki sug com kìfog, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ɓɛ yiìdi ɓum ɓɛɓɛɛ̀, ɓɛ ti lɔŋ com kìfog.
Fɔɔnnɛ mum kɛ̀ɛ ghasi com ki Bɛ̀ll à ràri.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ kpagà a mɛɛ, nni ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ tɔgtìghà Yeesus mɛ̀tɔɔ̀tɔɔgh ɓi kìɓan kiǹ.
Nni à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ: I mum à nàɓi giy, à ki wɔɔti giɓ adɛŋ di à kìi fìsɔ̀mɔ̀g ɓi rìɓa ɗi lɛ rì nyi rì gil a ǹtonto.
I giɓ a ɓèni yii à wɛy tì roàdɛŋ, di à kìi fìsɔ̀mɔ̀g.
Ɓum ɓɛ yughày Yeesus rì ɓɔɓti ɓɛsàg lɛ a kom̀ ɓɔ, wɔ̀lɛ ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ nyɛɛdɛ̀n ɓumɓɛ̀n.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à ghɛngà fɔlɔɔ, ki ɓeɓ nyi, à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Càrina ɓɔɔɓɔɓti ɓɛɛ yuiy a lɔ̀ŋkɛm̀ ɓisuulɛ kìlɔ̀ŋ kì Bɛ̀ll ki rì ɓisuu ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri yɛ̀ɛ ɓɔ.
Ǹkalii mìni ɓi saaɗ lɛ mum ǹcèm ànɛ à ghàɓi ɓi kilɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ maa ŋwɔɓti, àa ɗiŋi ɓi miì.
Fɔɔnnɛ à lɔ̀ɛ̀ɗkàkà ɓɔ, à màgì ɓɔ, ɗi a sasaghi ɓɔ ɓyàg ɓi nyòò.

Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà ɗì rìghaàgh, nni ŋwaàdɛŋ à pwaŋìghày rì mɛ̀ree, à yù nyi kì ɓaàgh mɛ̀ɗu asu, à tɔg nyi lɛ: Syeesyee à ǹɗèsàg, cɛ kɛɛ̀ki ǹghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì kìi ɓi ɗi lɛ ǹfɔ̀n lol a cɛɓ?
Yeesus à kpaa nyi lɛ: Ɓisuucɛ nnɛ ù reŋii mɛ̀ lɛ syeesyee à mum? Ŋwaàdɛŋ à yin syeesyee à mum di ki yìn lɛ Bɛ̀ll cɛ̀ncii.
Ù yii ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi lɛ: Kɔ̀ɔ wey mum, kɔ̀ɔ kì fisɔ̀mɔ̀g, kɔ̀ɔ yii com ki mum, kɔ̀ɔ pwàà mum kìɓan ɓi nyoo, kɔ̀ɔ kì mum kìɓe, nyaasi soŋi ɓɛɛ̀ gaa.
Ŋwaànɛ̀n à ɓàg nyi lɛ: Ǹɗèsàg, ǹtumɛ̀ngà rìɓèŋ ɗi ɓidɔ̀gsɛna ɓiǹ, di ǹkaka kìkeŋ ki mum.

Nni Yeesus à seesèèghà ŋwaànɛ̀n à keesì nyi, fɔɔnnɛ à kpaaghà min nyi lɛ: Com kɛɛ̀ ka kaakaàrɛ̀n wɔ̀ kìfog, kɛɛ ri lɛ, u kɛǹ, u kaɓ ɓyom ɓyɔɔ ɓìcèm, u kaɓsi mɔ̀ɔ̀ni mɛ miì rì ɓɛ̀soghàsogha, fɔɔnnɛ ù ɓiì ɓaà rì ìkum ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki aɗyòò; ajɛ̀m ìnɛn, u yu, u nɔɔ̀ti mɛ̀.
Wɔ̀lɛ yɛ̀ɛ ŋwaànɛ̀n à wokà fɔlɔɔ, à ɓeɓsì ìsu, à pɛ̀sɛ̀n à ghaàgh rì bim, ɓisuulɛ à ɓaghà rì ìkum lɛɛ̀gwey.
Nni Yeesus à kɛɛ̀sìghà mis ɓi ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà nyi jàŋbog à kpaa ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii lɛ: Ki teèsɛɛ lɛɛ̀gwey lɛ ɓɛ̀guŋgum ɓɛɛ ɗiŋi ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ wokà fɔlɔɔ, ɓɛ kuuràg. Yeesus à ki pɛ̀si ɓìtòkì à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓɔn ɓɛm, ki teèsɛɛ yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀nɔ̀ɓɔ̀ lɛ mum a ɗiŋi ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki aɗyoo.
Rìɗiŋì ɗi syàmoo a ɗiŋi ɓi ɗyas ɗi bààtà, ɗi ri tì lɛ fɛnfɛn ɗì rìɗìŋì ɗi guŋgum a ɗiŋi ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki aɗyoo.
Ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ kuuràkà tì lɛɛ̀gwey à cee fɔlɔɔ, ɓɛ tɔɔ̀ghtɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛ̀n wɔɔ ɓɔ rì ɓɔ lɛ: Ghɛn yɛɛ ri min lɛ à ghɛn cɛɓ?
Nni à pɛɓsɛ̀ngà ɓɔ à kpaa lɛ: Kìɓan kiǹ ki cee ìtèɗ wu mum, wɔ̀lɛ ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll, com ki lɛ ki yaaghrɛ̀n ki yin.
Nni Pyɛɛri à tumɛ̀ngà nyi rìkpaa lɛ: Ù ghɛɛ! ɓìsii rinìghày ɓyom ɓis ɓìcèm, tì nɔ̀ɔ̀tì wɔ̀.
Yeesus à ɓàg lɛ: Ǹkalii mìni ɓi saaɗ lɛ, mum à yin lɛ à naŋ yì lɛ rì mɛɛ mii, rì ɓɛ̀geni, rì seŋì, rì jɛɛ, rì ɓɔn ɓii nsoò lɛ ɓìden ɓii ɓi zi ɓisu wɛ̀m, rì ɓisuu Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ,

à rɔ̀ɓ lɛ à fɔ̀ni ɓi ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki ti ka ghɛghɛɓ ki miì ɓyom hɔnɗɛ̀ɗ ɓi rìkuu ɗi com ɗìcèm ɗi à nagày lɛ rì gɛ mɛɛ, ɓɛ̀geni, ɓɛ̀jɛɛ, ɓɔn, rì ɓìden ɓì zi, à ɓùtɛ̀n mɛ̀tɔɓ mɛ ɓum ɓɛɛ̀ kìki nyi miì ɓisuu righerɛ̀n, à ki teɗ cɛɓ ki fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ mɛɛ̀ yùyuiy.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà beèbɛ̀y ɓɛ ɓiì rɔ̀ɓi ajɛ̀m, ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà ajɛ̀m ɓɛ syoŋ̀ bee.

Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓi bee inɛ ɓi rìɓɔg a Yorisalɛm, Yeesus yɛɛ syoŋsyòŋgà ɓɔ bee. Ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ ɓaghà rì mɛ̀riighrikì, nsoò ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ nɔɔ̀nɔ̀ɔ̀tìghà ɓɔ, ɓɛ rirìsìghà girig. Nni Yeesus à tekà ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì ɓɛɓɛɛ̀rɛn a dwìɗ, à tumɛ̀n ɓɔ rìkpaa ɗi ɓiɓan ɓi ɓi ri nyi ɓiì kìi.

À kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓi ɗi tì rɛrɛrii ɗi, tì ɓɔɔgh yɛɛ lɛ a Yorisalɛm, wɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ɓiì kàɓi Man à mum ɓi ɓyàg ɓi ɓɛpìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey rì ɓi ɓyàg ɓi ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna; ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ ren lɛ ɓɛɛ wey nyi, ɓɛ ki ceesi nyi rì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ yii ɓi Bɛ̀ll.
Ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ rì nyi ɓiì fengii, ɓɛ tuutùù nyì tìtyɛɛ̀ ɓi nyoo, ɓɛ ɓog nyi kìtòn, ɓɛ wey nyi, wɔ̀lɛ ajɛ̀m ì mɛ̀ru mɛraa, à rì ɓiì ghèmɓɛɛ yi a ɓìloŋ.
Kìɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ki ɓɔn ɓɛ Zeɓede lɛ rì Zyag rì Zyaŋ ki yughà Yeesus a nyoo, ki kpaa nyi lɛ: Nɗèsàg, ti kɔ̀nkɔn lɛ u ki ɓìsi com ki tì rì ɓiì tɔɔ̀gh wɔ̀.
Yeesus à tɔg ɓɔ lɛ: Cɛ kɛ̀ɛ ki ɓi kɔ̀nkɔn lɛ ǹki mìni?
Ɓɛ kpaa nyi lɛ: Yɛ̀ɛ ù ɓiì ɓaà ɓi kìlàmì kɔɔ ki rikem, u gherɛn lɛ ti kɔri lɛ roànɛ wɔ̀ ɓi weèlem, roànɛ wɔ̀ ɓi kìmɛŋ.

Yeesus à pɛ̀ɛ̀zì ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓi yii gì ɓi rikuu ɗi kiɓan ɗi ɓi tɔtɔg ɗiǹ; ɓì rì lɛ ɓì cenɛ̀n lɛ ɓi nɔ ɓeŋ ànɛ mɛ̀ ǹɗì ɓiì nɔɔ̀, nsoò lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓaɓti mìni rìkuu ɗi bàɓtis ɗi ɓɛ ri mɛ̀ ɓiì ɓàɓtii?
Ɓɛ ɓaàg nyi lɛ: Tì rì lɛ tì cenɛ̀n. Yeesus à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Ki ri lɔŋ saaɗ lɛ ɓì rì ɓiì nɔɔ̀ ɓeŋ ànɛ mɛ̀ m̀ɓiì nɔɔ̀, ɓɛ ki ɓàɓti mini rìkuu ɗi bàɓtis ɗi ɓɛ ri mɛ̀ ɓiì ɓàɓtii;
kìɓan kifog, kìɓan ki lɛ mum a kɔri mɛ̀ ɓi weèlem nsoò lɛ ɓi kìmɛŋ, ki yin kiɓan kɛm̀; mɛ̀kɔ̀ɔ̀ mɛn mɛ rì ɓisuu ɓumɓɛ mɛ ri mɛ̀ pègsɛn ɓisu wàà.
Yɛ̀ɛ kìntɛ̀ɗ ki ɓɛyilàg kimbog ki wokà kìɓan kiǹ, mɛ̀rem maa mɛ ɓeɓtɛ̀n rì ɓɛ̀-Zyag ɓɛɛ̀ Zyaŋ.

Nni Yeesus à reŋìghà ɓɔɔ̀cèm, à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓì yii lɛ, ɓumbɛ ɓɛro ɓum ɓɛ ti ɓɛ regì lɛ mɛ̀fòm mɛ ɓilɔ̀ŋ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ pyengì ɓum mis rì ǹciìzɛ̀n, ɓɛ̀rɛlì-asu ɓaa, ɓɛ ceesàg gin mɔ̀ɔ rì rìlàmì ɗi ɓɔ.
Ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi ki ɓaà fɔlɔɔ ɓi nyìinyìm wìn. Kìɓan kìfog, ŋwaànɛ à kɔ̀ni lɛ a ɓa ǹlàmì ɓi nyìinyìm wìn, à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓaà ǹkìì-kìsay a ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛmbog.
Fɔɔnnɛ ŋwaànɛ à ɓiì kɔ̀ni lɛ a ɓa mìni ǹɗɛlì-asù, à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓaà ǹkpàn a mìni ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm.
Ɓisuulɛ Man à mum à yùghà ɓi lɛ ɓum ɓɛɛ kiki nyi ɓìsay, kìɓan kifog à yughà lɛ a say ɓisuu ɓum, à ki fa cɛɓ kii lɛ a kwèɗ ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey.

Nni ɓɛ kpagà a Zyeriko; yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus rì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛ pɛsɛ̀ngà lɛ ɓɛɛ ghaagh ǹɗaŋ ri kìtuu ki ɓum, nni ɓɛ tanɛ̀ngà ɗyaŋɗyàŋ àdɛŋ ɗii lɛ Baritimee, man à Timee, di à kɔ̀kɔrii ɓi bèn ì kìɓàà, à lɔnlɔ̀n ɓum ɓyom.
Yɛ̀ɛ ŋwaànɛ̀n à wokà lɛ Yeesus ànɛ a Naazarɛt yɛɛ ri ɓi rìghaàgh nni à tumɛ̀ngà nyi rìɓeràg jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo dì a kpaakpaa lɛ: Yeesus Man à Davit, wogha mɛ̀ nyìighnyìg.
Ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ kpɔmdɛ̀ngà nyi lɛ a maàrɛn wɔ̀lɛ nyii teŋzìghà tì jɛ̀ɛ̀ lɛɛ̀gwey di a kpaakpaa lɛ: Man à Davit wogha mɛ̀ nyìighnyìg.
Nni Yeesus à rɛrìghà, à kpaa ɓum lɛ: Reŋiinas̀ mɛ̀ nyi; ɓɛ̀roɓɛ̀n ɓɛ kɛǹ kì regii ɗyaŋɗyàŋ ànɛ̀n ɓɛ kpaa nyi lɛ: Tèèsi nyoo u pɛsɛn aɗyoo, nnyɛɛ̀ regi wɔ.
Nni ɗyaŋɗyàŋ ànɛ̀n à màkà rɛ̀ŋkweɗ wìì jɛ̀m lɛghɛ̀g, à pɛ̀sɛ̀n aɗyoo lɛ fàtweɗ, à kɛ̀n yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus.
Nni Yeesus à tɔkà nyi lɛ: U kɔ̀nkɔn lɛ ǹki wɔ̀ la? Ɗyaŋɗyaŋ à ɓàg nyi lɛ: Ràɓunì! Nkɔ̀nkɔn lɛ ǹghɛnɛ̀n tì.
Yeesus a kpaa min nyi lɛ: Rìgherɛ̀n ɗyɔɔ ɗi ghɛɓsii wɔ̀, kɛ̀na yàà. Ŋwaànɛ̀n à ghàs kì ghɛnɛɛ, à tumɛ̀n rìnɔ̀ɔ̀tì ɗi Yeesus ɓi bee.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓɛ ti ɓiì wuuwuɓsɛ̀n Yorisalɛm, di ɓɛ ti jàŋbog rì bàn yi lɛ rì Bɛtfazee rì Bɛtanii, nunùg rì dòn ì ɓɛ̀òlivyee, nni Yeesus à romgà ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛɓɛɛ̀

à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Kɛ̀ɛna ɓi maa kìlɔ̀ŋ ànɛ à rì mìni ànɛnii beèbɛ̀y; yɛ̀ɛ ɓi kpaŋkpaŋ wɔɔ, ɓi taatanɛ̀n man à jàɗki ànɛ ŋwaàdɛŋ à ka ɓɔkà ɓi miì di à rì ǹsuŋɛn, ɓi fumiì, ɓi yuis̀ mɛ̀ rì nyi.
I mum à tɔɔgh mìni lɛ, ɓì kìi fɔlɔɔ lɛ cɛ, ɓì ɓàg nyi lɛ, Kan yɛɛ̀ tɔki lɛ ɓɛɛ kɛǹ nyi rì yɔ̀. Ŋwaànɛ̀n à ɓiì ghàsi ki càri yɔ̀ lɛ yɛ̀ɛ yuis̀ fɛ.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ kɛngà ɓɛ tanɛ̀ngà man à jàɗki di à rì ǹsuŋɛn ɓi ɗyɔ̀m, jàŋbog rì ìsuunaa wudɛŋ, ɓi ǹwɔŋì wu bee, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ fumìghày nyi.
Ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà wɔɔ jàŋbog ɓɛ tɔkà ɓɔ lɛ: Cɛ kɛɛ̀ ki ɓi kìki lɔɔ? Ɓì ti ɓiì fùmii man à jàɗki ànɛ̀n lɛ la?
Ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ ɓaàg lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à kalìghà ɓɔ lɛ ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓàagh. Fɔɔnnɛ ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ caɗkà ɓɛ̀yilàg lɛ ɓɛɛ kɛǹ.
Nni ɓɛ kɛngà Yeesus rì man à jàɗki ànɛ̀n, ɓɛ ghày yɔ̀ ɓìlàà ɓyaa ɓi nyoo, Yeesus à kɔ̀rì miì.
Ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ ghaghàlà ɓìlàà ɓyaa ɓi bee, ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ghaghày maŋ mɛ mɛtɛn mɛ ɓɛ renɗèngày ɓi ɓɛ̀dɛm.
Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà Yeesus asu, rì ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ nɔɔ̀nɔ̀ɔ̀tìghày nyi ajɛ̀m ɓɛ kpaàkpàgsɛ̀n jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: Ozana! Rìkem ɗyɛɛ ɓa rì roànɛ à yùu yì ɓi ɗii ɗi Kan.
Rìkem ɗyɛɛ ɓa rì kìlàmì ki ki yuù yì, kìlàmì ki Davit à seŋi wìs; ozana! Rìkem ɗyɛɛ ɓa ɓi ɗyoo ɓi ɗùm.

Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à ɗiŋìghà a Yorisalɛm, à kɛ̀n ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll. Yɛ̀ɛ à lègsìghà kì ghɛɛ̀ ɓyom ɓìcèm, nni à kɛ̀ngà à Bɛtanii rì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓiì ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì ɓɛɓɛɛ̀, ɓisuulɛ cààmɛ̀n ki ɓaghà di ki mɛ cee.
Ɓi duri tana, zày ì kɔ̀ngà Yeesus di ɓɛ mɛ pɛ̀sɛn yi a Bɛtanii.

Nni à pìkà mis fìràɓ, à ghɛn ǹɗyèm wu fìgyee rì tyɛn lɛ mɔɓ-mɔɓ. Fɔɔnnɛ à kɛ̀ngà a fìgyee ànɛ̀n zi lɛ a ghɛǹ ǹkòo à rì lɛ à tanɛ̀n ɓìɗùn miì. Yɛ̀ɛ à kpagà wɔɔ azi, à tanɛ̀n lɛ à rì lɔŋ tyɛn rì tyɛn ɓisuulɛ, àa cààmɛ̀n ki lɛ ɓɛ̀fìgyee ɓɛɛ wum kɛɛ ɓaghà.
Nni Yeesus à tòòghrɛ̀ngà, à kpaa ǹɗyèm wu fìgyee wiǹ lɛ: Mum àa ɗi ti ɓi kiɗùn kɔɔ nsoò ŋwos bog; jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ à kpaaghà ìnɛn ì kɛ̀ngà ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓi mɛ̀reè.

Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ kpagà a Yorisalɛm, nni Yeesus à ɗinìghà ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll, à tumɛ̀n rìnàɓ ri ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ kakàɓkà ɓyom ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll, rì ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ lalàkà; fɔɔnnɛ à ɓigtàkà ɓɛ̀teɓèrè ɓɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ceècènɗìghà mɔ̀ɔ̀ni, à ɓigtàg girig mɛ̀kɔ̀ɔ̀ mɛ ɓɛroɓɛ ɓɛ kakàɓkà ɓɛ̀kuùkuù.
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à càɗkà ɓi nsoò mum bog lɛ a ɓa rì ǹtɛ̀g wudɛŋ ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll.
Nni à rèrèsìghà ɓum di a kpaakpaa lɛ: Ki ri kì kànɛn lɛ: Naa yɛ̀m ì ɓiì ɓaà ɗii lɛ naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n ɓisuu ɓilɔ̀ŋ ɓìcèm. Kìɓan kifog, mìnii ghaasii yɔ̀ naa ì ɓɛ̀wiiwìì.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey rì ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓɛ wokà fɔlɔɔ, ɓɛ tumɛ̀n rìkaa ɗi bee inɛ lɛ ɓɛɛ wey nyi; ɓɛ ki rirìsìghà nyi lɛ, ɓìɓan ɓi à rèrèsìghà ɓi komkòmgà ɓum mɛ̀rem.
Yɛ̀ɛ cɛŋkò ki kpagà, Yeesus à pɛ̀sɛ̀n ɓi bàn ìnɛn à ghaàgh.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ ghaghàghìyà rì sariwa, ɓɛ ghɛngà di fìgyee ànɛ Yeesus à cɛ̀mgà a ti ǹkporiyɛn lɛ rì gàŋ miì.
Yɛ̀ɛ Pyɛɛri à yitìghà kìɓan ki ki kilɛ̀ngà ɓi rìŋkò à ŋwos anɛ̀n nni, à kpaaghà Yeesus lɛ: Raɓì! ghɛna fìgyee ànɛ wɔ̀ɔ ǹcɛ̀mi yɛ̀ɛ à kporii!
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à tòòghrɛ̀ngà, à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Tyweeyiina Bɛ̀ll.

I ŋwaà kalii dòn ìnɛ lɛ: Pɛ̀sɛn foo, u kɛǹ kì kpìi ɓi rìɓày, nnɛ à rì kɛɛ̀ nyoey ɓi ǹɗem, à gherɛ̀n lɔŋ lɛ com ki à kpaa kɛɛ̀ kìikilɛ̀n, ǹkalii mìni ɓi saaɗ lɛ ŋwaànɛ̀n miì à ɓiì ghɛɛ̀ kìɓan kiǹ di ki kilɛ̀ɛ̀.
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki kìlaaghna lɛ, com kìcèm ki ɓì tɔɔgh ɓi bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n, ɓì gherɛ̀n lɛ ɓì ti rì kɔ, fɔɔnnɛ ɓì rì kɔ ɓiì ghɛɛ̀ di ki kilɛɛ.
Nni cààmɛ̀n kìcèm ki ɓì rɛlii lɛ ɓi ki bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n, i ɓì ri ɓi kìɓan ri ŋwaàdɛŋ, càrina kìɓan kiǹ, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ Seŋi wìn ànɛ à rì aɗyoo, à ri cenɛn mini girig mɛ̀nànì min.
Wɔ̀lɛ i ɓì ti kɛ̀ ɓi cenɛn ɓum, Seŋi wìn ànɛ à rì aɗyoo àa cenɛn ɓì girig mìni mɛ̀nànì min.

Yeesus rì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛ sugtìghà tì a Yorisalɛm. Nni yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à kɛ̀ɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀ghà ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ ɓɛgwey rì ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna, rì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ kilɔ̀ŋ ɓɛ yughày nyi a nyoo
ɓɛ tɔg nyi lɛ: Rì ìtèɗ aɗi nnɛ u kìki ɓiɓan ɓi, ghɛn yɛɛ faa wɔ̀ ìtèɗ wulɛ u kiki ɓyɔ?
Yeesus à ɓàg ɓɔ lɛ: Mɛ̀ɛ ntɔg girig mìni ntɔɔ̀tɔɔgh, i ɓì ɓàagh wɔ, fɔɔnnɛ mɛ̀ɛ nkali mìni, rì ìtèɗ aɗi nnɛ nkìki ɓiɓan ɓi.
Bàɓtis ì Zyaŋ ì ɓaghày aɗyoo gìn ɓum ɓɛɛ ɓaghày rì yɔ̀? Ɓàaghna mɛ̀.
Wɔ̀lɛ ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ fiɓìghà ǹtɔɔ̀tɔɔgh wiǹ wɔɔ ɓɔ rì ɓɔ, ɓɛ kpaa lɛ: I tì ɓàagh nyi lɛ, ì ɓaghày aɗyoo, à rì ɓìsi ɓiì tɔɔ̀gh lɛ: Nni ɓì gherɛ̀ngà ɓi yɔ̀ lɛ cɛ?

I tì ki pɛ̀ɛ̀zii nyi lɛ: Ɓum ɓɛɛ ɓaghày rì yɔ̀... ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛǹ, rì ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna, rì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn, ɓɛ rirìsìghà ɓum ɓɛ kilɔ̀ŋ, lɛ ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ gherìghà lɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ lɛ, Zyaŋ à rì ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ɓakà Yeesus lɛ: Ɓìsii yii ɓì. Nni Yeesus à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ: Mɛ̀ girig màa kpaa ɓi mini fe nnɛ ìtèɗ wu nkìki ɓiɓan miì, wu riì mɛ̀.

Nni Yeesus à tumɛ̀ngà min ɓɔ rìkpaa ɗi kiɓan ɓi dàɗkì lɛ: Ŋwaàdɛŋ yɛɛ salà dɛm yiì, à ɓɛ̀y viìnyɛ̀ miì, à cèŋzɛ̀n yɔ̀ ri gari, à kì wayɗ ɓi dɛm incèm, à ki toŋ ɓyoo mɛɛ wɔɔ. Fɔɔnnɛ à faghà yɔ̀ ɓi rɛntì rì ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay, nyii kɛǹ rìkɛ̀ɛ̀.
Yɛ̀ɛ viìnyɛ̀ ì ɓàgà lɛ ɓɛɛ kɛs, nni à pɛ̀sìghà mum, à rom a ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓɛ à faghà dɛm ri ɓɔ, lɛ ɓɛɛ fa nyi gàɓ yìi ɓyom ɓi ɓi dɛm.
Nni ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓɛǹ ɓɛ ɓangà ŋwaànɛ ɓɛ romgày ànɛn, ɓɛ kwiy nyi, ɓɛ pɛɛ̀zì nyi rì jɛ̀m ɓyàg zɛy yɛ̀ɛ masà wìì.
Fɔɔnnɛ ŋwaàdɛm à pɛ̀sìghà tì ŋwaàdɛŋ, à romdì tì a ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓɛ ɓi dɛm ɓɛǹ; ɓɛ̀roɓɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓog ŋwaàncèm ɓi ǹto, ɓɛ ki sɛmgi nyi.

Nni ŋwaàdɛm à romdìghà tì lɔŋ mum ɓi gɛ̀n i kìraa, ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ wey ŋwaà-fìtom ancèm; ɓɛ kitìghà tì girig ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ ŋwaàdɛm a romgà com kìfog; ɓɛ ki lɛ: Ɓɛ kwiy ɓɛ̀roɓɛ, ɓɛ cuusì ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛmbog.

Lɔŋ m̀bobog à mum ànɛ ŋwaàdɛm à ɓaghà di à mɛ rɔ̀ɓ ri nyi à ɓaghà lɔŋ lɛ man wiì ànɛ à keesìghà lɛɛ̀gwey; nyi nnɛ à siitɛ̀ngà kì romì a ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓɛ ɓi dɛm yiì, à fèkì lɛ, ɓɛ ri ɓiì kuuraagh man wiì.
Wɔ̀lɛ ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓɛ wɔrɛ̀ngà ɓɛ kpaa lɛ: Roànɛ yɛɛ ri ɓiì rɔ̀ɓi ri dɛm i seŋì; yùuna, ti wey nyi di dɛm yɛ̀ɛ woòghrɛn rì ɓìsi.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ɓangà min man ànɛ̀n ɓɛ wey, ɓɛ mag kìloŋ kii jɛ̀m ì gari i dɛm.
Nni ǹtɔɔ̀tɔɔgh wu ri lɛ: Cɛ kɛɛ̀ ki ŋwaàdɛm a rì ɓiì kìi? Ŋwaàdɛm a ɓiì yùu, à cuusì ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓɛǹ à ki reɓsɛn dɛm ri ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ lɛ ɓɛɛ sasay.
Ɓì ka ɓala ɓì nya yɛ̀ɛ ki ri kì kànɛn lɛ: Gɔ̀g ìnɛ ɓɛ̀toŋì-mɛɛ ɓɛ makà, yɛ̀ɛ ki ghalà gɔ̀g ìnɛ yɛ̀ɛ konag kìlèmi ǹtɔn à mɛɛ?
Kìɓan kiǹ ki ɓaghày yɛ̀ɛ Kan, ki ki rì dàm ì kìɓan ìnɛ ì kìlɛɛ ɓìsi ɓi mis.
Mɛ̀fòm mɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n mɛ kaakààghà bee inɛ lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓaǹ Yeesus, kìɓan kifog, ɓɛ risìghà gùl ì ɓum; ɓɛ ghɛngà lɛ Yeesus à tekà dàɗkì ìnɛn ɓi ɓɔ, nni ɓɛ pɛsɛ̀ngà, ɓɛ ghaaghràg.
Ɓɛ rom lɛ rì Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛdɛŋ rì ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɓi ǹɗaŋ wu Eroodɛ yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus lɛ ɓɛɛ wɔɔ̀si nyi ɓi ɓìtòkì ɓii.

Nni ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ yughày, ɓɛ kpaa nyi lɛ: Ǹɗèsàg, ti yii lɔŋ lɛ ù rì ŋwaànɛ a kpaakpaa saaɗ, ù ki ti kɔ̀ɔ risi mum, ɓisuulɛ, wɔ̀ɔ̀ yin ɓiì nɔ̀ɔnɔɔ̀tì rìɓa ɗi mum, u rèresi ɓum bee inɛ yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll yɛ̀ɛ ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ. Nni kali ɓìsi ǹkòo ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓis ɓi gherɛɛ lɛ ti peèghi làmpoŋ̀ rì Kaaza; ki ri kàŋbɛn lɛ ti peè gìn ki yin kàŋbɛn?
Yeesus à yighà lɛ ɓɛ purii nyi càg ɓi ɗùm yɛɛ ri, fɔɔnnɛ à tɔkà ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓisuucɛ nnɛ ɓi fèeghfeèghrɛ̀n mɛ̀? Yùunay mɛ̀ fɛ rì fìraŋ̀ nghɛǹ.
Nni ɓɛ yughày nyi rì fìraŋ̀, à tɔg ɓɔ lɛ: Kìfèèghrɛnà ki ghɛn kɛɛ ri lɛ miì? Ɗii ɗi ghɛn ɗyɛɛ ki rì tì lɛ? Ɓɛ ɓaàg nyi lɛ: Ɓi ri yɛɛ lɔɔ lɛ, rì kìfèèghrɛnà ki Kaaza, rì ɗii ɗìì.
Yeesus à kpaa min ɓɔ lɛ: Pɛ̀ɛ̀ziina ɓyom ɓi Kaaza rì Kaaza, ɓì pɛ̀ɛ̀zì ɓi Bɛ̀ll rì Bɛ̀ll. Ɓɛ kuuràkà lɛɛ̀gwey yɛ̀ɛ à ɓàkà ɓɔ fɔlɔɔ.
Ɓɛ̀sàdùsyɛŋ ɓɛ ɓɛɛ kpaaghi lɛ, com kidɛŋ ki yin lɛ rìghèmɓɛ̀n ɗi ɓilòŋ, ɓɛ yughày Yeesus a nyoo, ɓɛ tɔg nyi lɛ:

Ǹɗèsàg, Moyis à kàngà lɛ ti kilag lɛ; i gèni mum à wii à càɗ giɓ di à ka yin ɗi man ɗì nyi, geni ŋwaànɛ à wii ànɛ̀n, à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì wɔlì ǹkpɔɓ wii, à yay ɓɔn rì wɔ ɓi ɗii ɗi geni.
Wɔ̀lɛ ki kilɛ̀ngà lɛ; ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛɛ ɓaghà ɓi rìgeni ɗyaa ɓɛsɛ̀ɛ̀ taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀, baŋì rì baŋì. Roà ǹtonto à wɔlɛ̀n, à ki wu kɛ̀ɛ càɗ man;
geni à kìɓɛ̀ɛ̀ à teɗ ǹkpɔɓ wii, nyi girig à wu, kɛ̀ɛ càɗ man, ki kilɛ̀ngà tì fɔlɔɔ ri roà kìraa,
rì ɓɛro ɓɛmbog ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm, nsoò mum bog ànɛ ɓi ɓɔ ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀, à càɗkà ɓì man rì giɓ anɛ̀n. Ajɛ̀m ì kìtaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ki ɓum kìn, nnɛ giɓ anɛ̀n à wughà girig.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓum ɓɛ kitaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛn ɓɛ wɔlà giɓ anɛ̀n ɓɔɔ̀cèm, nni à ɓaa gɛ gili ghɛn anɛ ɓì ɓɔ ŋwosi righèmɓɛ̀n ɗi ɓiloŋ?
Yeesus à ɓàkà ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓì pwààrɛɛ, ɓisuulɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓì yii ɓi nya ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi kaàtà à Bɛ̀ll, kɛ̀ ɓi ki yi itèɗ wu Bɛ̀ll.
Lɛ ŋwosi righèmɓɛ̀n ɗi ɓilòŋ, ɓɛ̀baŋì ɓaa wɔɔti ɓi ɓɛ̀yiɓ, ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓɛ̀ kɛ̀ɛ wɔɔti ɓɛbaŋì, kìɓan kifog ɓɔɔ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓaa gɛ lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓum ɓɛ titom ɓɛ ɓɛ ri aɗyòò.
Ɓi kìɓan ki righèmɓɛ̀n ɗi ɓiloŋ ki ɓi tɔtɔ̀g, ɓì ɓalà ɓi kaàtà à Moyis jàŋ ìnɛ Bɛ̀ll à kpaaghà nyi ɓi kìtwìɗ lɛ: Ǹɗì Bɛ̀ll à Abiraham, Bɛ̀ll à Isag, Bɛ̀ll à Yakɔɓ?
Ki rèsii lɛ Bɛ̀ll à yin Bɛ̀ll à ɓìloŋ, a rì Bɛ̀ll à ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri cem; ɓi rì ɓi rìnàn lɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀.

Kìbog ki ɓi ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna kidɛŋ ki wowòkà yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à nyoònyòlɛ̀ngà rì ɓumɓɛ̀n, ki ki ghɛn lɛ Yeesus à konàkà ɓɔ kì ɓàagh. Nni à tyɛ̀ɛ̀tɛ̀ngày, à tɔg Yeesus lɛ: Kìdɔ̀gsɛna kibe kɛɛ cee ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓìcèm?
Yeesus à ɓàkà lɛ: Kìdɔ̀gsɛna ki asu kɛɛ̀ki lɛ: Wɔ̀ Isirayɛl, wogha lɛ Kan Bɛ̀ll wìs nnyɛɛ ri lɔŋ Kan cɛ̀ncii.
Fɔɔnnɛ keesi Kan Bɛ̀ll wɔ̀ɔ̀, rì ǹɗem wɔɔ wucèm, rì ǹghay wɔɔ wucèm, rì mɛ̀yitì mɔɔ mɛcèm, rì ìtèɗ wɔɔ wucèm.
Ki kiɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ki ri lɛ: Keesi romum ànɛ wɔ̀ jàŋbog lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ wɛ̀ɛmìɗ; kìdɔ̀gsɛna kìdɛŋ kì ki cee ɓiǹ, ki yiìdi.
Nni ǹɗèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna anɛ̀n à kpaaghà Yeesus lɛ: Raɓì, com ki ù kpaa ki ri miì, lɛ Bɛ̀ll à rì lɔŋ bog fɔɔnnɛ Bɛ̀ll ìdɛŋ ì yiìdi;

rì tì lɛ, mum à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì keesii Bɛ̀ll rì nɗem wii wucèm, rì ɗyomzɛ̀n ɗii ɗicèm, rì ìtèɗ wii wucèm, à ki keesi ti romum ànɛ àrì nyi jàŋbog yɛ̀ɛ nyimìɗ; rìkì ɗiǹ ɗi rɔɔtɛɛ ɗi cee ɓìtuwe ɓi mum à rì lɛ à tɔ̀ngì ɓisuu Bɛ̀ll, nsoò ɓyom ɓi à rì lɛ à fùnɛ̀n lɛ a ɓɔgsi Bɛ̀ll miì.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à ghɛngà lɛ ŋwaànɛ̀n à ɓàagh kìɓan kiǹ rì ɗyomzɛ̀n, nni à kpaaghà nyi lɛ: Ù ràɓsɛɛ ɓi kilɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll; ajɛ̀m ìnɛn, ŋwaàdɛŋ à ghɛɛsìghà tì ɓi lɛ a tɔg ti nyi ntɔɔ̀tɔɔgh.
Yeesus à tekà jɛ̀ɛ̀, à tumɛ̀n ɓum rìrèsàg ɗi ɓiɓan ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll, à tɔg lɛ: Ɓisuucɛ nnɛ ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓɛ ti ɓɛ kpaaghì lɛ Kiris à rì man à Davit?

Davit nyimiɗ a kpaaghà, di Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay ki mɛ fa nyi ɗyomzɛ̀n lɛ: Kan àa ǹkpaa Kan wɛ̀m lɛ: Kɔ̀ri mɛ̀ fɛ ɓi weèlem à kpaŋ yɛ̀ɛ ǹɗì ɓiì ghaasii ɓɛ̀bènàbena ɓɔɔ com ki rɛsakɛn mɛkòò mɔɔ miì.
I Davit nyimiɗ a reŋii nyi lɛ Kan, Lannɛ ki kɛɛ̀dii kì kpaŋì lɛ a ɓa ti man wiì? Coo gùl ì ɓum ì wowòkà ɓìɓan ɓi Yeesus à kpaakpààghà rì kìnyàà ɓi ǹɗem.

Nni à kpaaghà ɓum ɓɛ à rèèrèsàkà ɓɛǹ lɛ: Konaaghna rì ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ keesàg rìrerènì ɗi jàŋ di ɓɛ waataagh ɓyoo ɓɛ̀kàɓà, ɓɛ kɔngì girig lɛ ɓɛɛ toòtògsì ɓɔ rì coo nyaasɛ̀n ɓi gwìy.
Ki rɔɔghì ɓɔ lɛ ɓɛɛ kɔri ɓi mɛ̀kɔ̀ɔ̀ mɛ asu di ɓɛ kɛɛ̀ kìsɛ̀nɛ̀, ɓɛ ki teki mɛkɔ̀ɔ̀ mɛ beèbɛ̀y ɓi naa yi bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n.
Ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ̀fog ɓɛɛ ti ɓɛ pumzàg mɛ̀kpɔɓ mɛ ɓɛ̀yiɓ, ɓɛ ki kìlag ɓyoo bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n lɛ ɓum ɓɛɛ sɛsɛg ɓɔ. Ɓɛ ri teri gɛ kìtèetèɗ ki pɔnɔsì ki ki ɓaa gɛ fɔlɔɔ lɛ yoɓ.
Yeesus à kɔ̀rìghà, a fa mis rì fìkɔrɔŋ fi ɓɛ ǹpìkì mɔ̀ɔ̀ni mɛ bɔgsì miì à seesèè yɛ̀ɛ ɓìtuu ɓi ɓum ɓi pipìkà mɔ̀ɔ̀ni; ɓɛ̀guŋgum lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ suùsùùrì ɓyoo mɔ̀ɔ̀ni.
Nni maa ǹkpɔɓ a giɓ a yùghày girig, à pìg ɓɔɔ tiraŋ̀ ɓɛɓɛɛ̀rɛn ɓɛ kpaŋɛn dolà yiɓɛɛ̀ ɓi fìkɔrɔŋ.
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à regìghà ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii, à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Ǹkpaa mìni ɓi saaɗ lɛ, rìfa ɗi maa ǹkpɔɓ a giɓ anɛ ɗi cee ri mum bimiɗ ànɛ à piìgh mɔ̀ɔ̀ni ɓi fìkɔrɔŋ;
ɓisuulɛ ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm ɓaa pìigh gàɓ ì mɔ̀ɔ̀ni ìnɛ yàa mɛ rɔ̀ɓ ɓɔ kɛ̀ɛ̀ kìsay, wɔ̀lɛ giɓ anɛ nyaa foŋi gàɓ ì com bimiɗ ìnɛ àa rì rì yɔ̀, ìnɛ àa ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ à ghɛɓ miì.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à kpagày ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll, nni kìbog ki ɓi ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii kì kpaaghà nyi lɛ: Raɓì, ghɛna ɓyoo gɔ̀g ɓi, rì coo syeesyee à rìtoŋ!
Yeesus à ɓàg nyi lɛ: Ù ghɛɛ coo kitoŋ ki ɓɛ togà kiǹ, nsoò gɔ̀g bog yàa rɔ̀ɓ ti ɓi ǹsasaghiyɛn ɓi ìmbog.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à kɔ̀rìghà ɓi dòn ì ɓɛ̀olivyee, à pɛ̀ɛ̀zì mis rì naà-Bɛ̀ll nni ɓɛ̀-Pyɛɛri rì Zyag rì Zyaŋ rì Andire ɓɛ tɔkà nyi a dwìɗ lɛ:
Kali ɓìsi fin innɛ ki ri ɓiì kìlɛɛ, rì kìrèmzɛnà ki ki ri ɓiì rèsii lɛ rìsugtɛ̀n ɗi ɓiɓan ɓìcèm ɗi kpaŋi.
Nni Yeesus à tumɛ̀ngà min ɓɔ rìkpaa lɛ: Ɓì konàg lɛ mum kɛ̀ɛ yègsi mini.
Ɓisuulɛ ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ ɓiì yùu ri ɗii ɗyɛ̀m, rì ànɛn miì à kpaa lɛ mɛ̀ yɛɛ ri Kiris, ɓɛ ki rì ɓiì syòŋi ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey.
I ɓì woogh ɗi ɓɛɛ kpaakpaa ɓiɓan ɓi mɛ̀y, rì gom yi mɛ̀y mɛ mɛɛ̀ ɗùuɗuùrɛ̀n, kɛ̀ ɓi risi, lɛ ɓìɓan ɓiǹ ɓìcèm ɓi ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì kìlɛɛ, kìɓan kifog àa rìlèg ɗi zi ɗyɛɛ ri ɓiì ɓaà lɔɔ.

Ki ɓiì ɓaà lɛ, ɓumɓɛ ɓi tum a zi anɛ, ɓɛ ram wɛ̀y ri ɓɛ ɓi tum a zi ambog, ɓɛ ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki ɓɛ ram wɛ̀y ri ɓɛ ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ kimbog, fɔɔnnɛ zi i ɓiì kìi lɛ rì foo ì nyɛ̀ŋɗɛ̀n; rì foo ì nyɛ̀ŋɗɛ̀n, zày ì ki kìki jàŋ jàŋ. Ɓìɓan ɓiǹ ɓi ɓiì ɓaà rìtumɛ̀n ɗi mɛtɔɓ.

Konaaghna rì mìniìɓɔmiɗ lɛ ɓum ɓɛ ri ɓiì kɛ̀ɛ ri mìni ɓi ɓìkpanà ɓi ɓɛyɔ̀m, ɓɛ ki ɓog mini kìtòn ɓi naa yi bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n. Ɓì ɓiì rɛlii ɓɛyɔ̀m ɓi mis mɛ ɓɛ̀gɔmìnà rì ɓi mis mɛ mɛfòm, ɓisuu kiɓan kɛm̀ lɛ ɓi resi ɓɔ saaɗ ànɛ miì.
Kìɓan ki asu ki ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì kìlɛɛ ki ri ɓiì ɓaà lɛ, Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ a ka kalɛn ɓi ɓɛ̀tum ɓɛ zi ɓɛ̀cèm.

Nni yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ɓiì ɓangii mini, ɓɛ sɔmɛ̀n mìni rì ɓɛ̀làmì lɛ ɓɛɛ yɔm̀ mìni, mɛ̀rem min mɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ log ki cɛɛcɛɛ̀rɛ̀n ɓi mùm rì com ki ɓì ɓiì kpaà, kìɓan kifog, kpaana lɔŋ com ki ki ri mìni ɓiì ɓɔghìì ɓi ǹɗem ɓi cààmɛ̀n à ɓɛ̀yɔ̀m, lɛ àa mìniìɓɔmiɗ yɛɛ ri ɓiì tòòghrɛɛ, lɔŋ Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay kɛɛ ri ɓiì tòòghrɛɛ.
Mum à ri tɔ̀kɛn geni lɛ a wey nyi, seŋi à tɔ̀kɛ̀n man wiì lɛ a wey, ɓɔn ɓɛ ram wɛ̀y ri ɓɛ̀yalì ɓaa, ɓɛ ki cuusi ɓɔ.
Ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ri mìni ɓiì ɓèèzɛɛ ɓisu wɛ̀m, kìɓan kifog ŋwaànɛ à ɓiì sììrɛɛ à kpaŋ a rìsugtɛ̀n nnyɛɛ ɓiì ghɛɛ cɛɓ.

Yɛ̀ɛ ɓì ɓiì ghɛɛ̀ di ɓum ɓɛ ti ɓiì kìkii ɓìɓe ɓi ɓi ri koŋnyoo ɓi jàŋ inɛ ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi, ŋwaànɛ a ɓàɓay ɓiɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì kɔ̀rii ɗyomzɛ̀n; nni ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓiì ɓaà a Zyude, ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì ghɛŋii ɓi dòn aɗyòò.
Ŋwaànɛ à ɓiì ɓaà ɓi mɛɛ aɗyoo, kɛɛ̀ sɛɛdii lɛ a teɗ com ɓi nàà.
Fɔɔnnɛ ŋwaànɛ à ɓiì ɓaà ɓi dɛm, kɛ̀ɛ sugtii rì jɛ̀m lɛ a teɗ rìga.
Nyìighnyìg rì ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓɛ mèm, rì ɓɛ̀gɛɓyɛ̀y ɓɛ ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ̀n.
Ɓɔ̀ŋzaaghna Bɛ̀ll lɛ kìɓan kiǹ kɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ kìlɛn ɓi cààmɛ̀n à bùmà.
Ɓisuulɛ mɛ̀ru mɛ̀n mɛ ɓiì ɓaà rì rìkuu ɗi ǹtɔɓ ɗi ɗi ka ghɛnɛ̀ngà ɓi, a tumɛ̀n yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll à kìghà lɛ rì ɗyoo rì zi, à kpaŋ ɓigomìnɛ; rìkuu ɗi ǹtɔɓ ɗìn ɗi ki ghɛnɛɛ gɛ tì ɓi ɓi ziinɛ.
I Kan Bɛ̀ll kɛ̀ɛ ghaɓi mɛru mɛ̀n, di nsoò mum bog à yin lɛ à ghɛɓ; kìɓan kifog à ghaɓìghà mɔ ɓisuu ɓum ɓii ɓɛ à rɔ̀tɛ̀ngà.
I ŋwaàdɛŋ à kpaa mìni lɛ, Kiris à rì fɛ nsoò lɛ fɛnii, kɛ̀ ɓi wog;

ɓisuulɛ ɓɛ̀-kiris ɓɛ ɓɛpwàà, rì ɓɛ̀pwààpwaà ɓɛ ɓɛkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan ɓɛ ɓiì yùu, ɓɛ kikì lɛ rì dàm yi ɓiɓan rì ɓɛ̀koŋnyoo ɓɛ ɓiɓan ɓi lèg ànɛ lɛ, i kaa rì lɛ ki kilɛ̀n, ɓɛ ri lɛ ɓɛ syoŋ̀ nsoò ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀ɓɔ̀nɛn.
Ǹloogh mìni kì wogsii ɓiɓan ɓìcèm, kɔ̀riina ɗyomzɛ̀n rì ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ ɓìn kì ghɛnɛɛ.
Ajɛ̀m ì ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛru ɓìn, kìsaa ki ŋwos ki ri kpìi gɛ ɓirìm, ŋwii kɛ̀ɛ lòmdi.
Tyɔɛy tì kɔɔ̀kɔ̀sɛ̀n yì aɗyoo, di tyɛɛ̀ kpìkpì, mɛ̀tèɗ mɛ ɓi ɗyoo mɛ nyɛŋɗɛ̀n.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓum ɓɛ ghɛɛ gɛ ɗi Man à mum à rìì ɓi ɓìkwìɗ rì coo itèɗ, rì rìgwey.
Fɔɔnnɛ à romi gɛ min ɓum ɓii ɓɛ titom ɓi ɓɛ̀tum ɓɛ zi ɓɛ̀cèm lɛ ɓɛɛ taŋzɛn ɓum ɓii ɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀ɓɔ̀nɛn ɓi zi bimiɗ.
Terina kìfèèghrɛnà ɓi ǹɗyèm wu fìgyee. Cààmɛ̀n kìcèm ki ɓɛ ghɛɛ di myaɓ mɛɛ̀ wòowomzɛ̀n, tyɛn ti tɔtɔ̀ɓ, ɓɛ ti ɓɛ̀yilàg lɛ bwey yi yuù rì rìsɛn.
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ mìni girig, ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì yii lɛ Man à mum à ti jàŋbog ɗì rìyù di ɓì ghɛɛ ɓìɓan ɓiǹ ɓìcèm.
Ǹkalii mìni ɓi saaɗ lɛ, bɔ̀ɓ i ɓum ìnɛ yàa lèg ɓi bimiɗ di ɓìɓan ɓi ɓìcèm ɓi ka kilɛn ɓi.
Ɗyoo rì zi ɓi ri ɓiì lèegh, kìɓan kìfog ɓìɓan ɓyɛm̀ ɓyaa lèg ɓi.
Ŋwaàdɛŋ à yii ɓi gòn nsoò cààmɛ̀n kiǹ; nsoò ɓum ɓɛ titom ɓɛ aɗyoo, nsoò Man à Bɛ̀ll, àdɛŋ ànɛ ɓi ɓɔ à yii ɓi gòn inɛ̀n, lɔŋ Tààta cɛ̀ncii yɛɛ yii.
Konaghna, ɓì ki ɓa cem, lɛ ɓì yii ɓi fin innɛ cààmɛ̀n ki ɓiì kpaŋì.

Kìɓan kiǹ ki ri ɓiì ɓaà lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ŋwaànɛ à kɛ̀ɛ rìkɛ̀ɛ̀, à càɗ mɛɛ mii, à reɓsàg ɓìɓan ɓii ri ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay lɛ, rì ànɛn miì rì ìsu wii wu kisay, à ki siitag m̀ɓèŋì-ìsuunaa lɛ, a kɔri cem.
Fɔɔnnɛ kɔ̀riina cem, lɛ ɓì yii ɓi fin innɛ ŋwaàmɛɛ a ɓiì kpaŋì. À rì lɛ à kpaŋ cɛŋkò, nsoò lɛ rì ǹɗem-irù, nsoò lɛ di ɓɛ̀lem ɓaa rɔ̀ŋ, nsoò lɛ sariwa;
ɓì konàg lɛ, kɛ̀ɛ ɓa lɛ à kpaŋ lɛ vuàs, à tanɛ̀n mìni di ɓì rì ɓi fìlo.
Kìɓan ki ǹkpaa mìni ki, ǹkpaa kɔ ɓisuu ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm: Kɔ̀riina cem.

Tìcàɓ ti Paskà ti ɓɛnkìlàg bìrɛs kɛ̀ɛ̀ nwìɗ miì ti ɓaghà di tyaa rɔ̀ɓ mɛru mɛɓɛɛ̀, nni ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey rì ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓɛ kaakààghà bee inɛ lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓaǹ Yeesus a rìnyam ɓɛɛ wey nyi.
Lɛ ɓɛ kpaakpààghà lɛ, kìɓan kiǹ ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi ki kìlɛɛ ɓi nyìinyìm à tìcàɓ, lɛ ki ɓiì yùu yi rì kìyoòyòò ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ.

Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à ɓaghà a Bɛtanii ɓi naa ì Simɔn ànɛ à ɓaghà kukwiy, nni giɓ adɛŋ à ɗiŋìghày di Yeesus a ɗiɗi ɓiɗilàg, giɓ anɛ̀n à ɓaghày rì ɓeŋ ànɛ a ɓaghà ǹsoɓɛn ri rìkuu ɗi gɔ̀g ɗi ŋwèrim-ŋwèrim, ɓeŋ àncèm à ɓaghà ǹɗonɛn ri ɓìsyeesyee ɓi tirààre, ɓi ɓi ɓaghà ɓì kɛŋɛn lɛɛ̀gwey; fɔɔnnɛ à weeyàkà ɓeŋ ànɛ̀n, à sùùrì Yeesus tìrààre ɓi ǹto.
Nni ki ɓeɓkà ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà wɔɔ, ɓɛ tumɛ̀n rìŋwɔ̀ŋwɔ̀ŋì di ɓɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa lɛ, ki ghɛɓsii cɛ lɛ a yogsi tìrààre fɛlɛ̀?
Tyàa rì lɛ ti cee ɓɛ̀tɔɔsìm ɓɛraa, di ɓɛ kaɓi tyɔ, ɓɛ fa mɔ̀ɔ̀ni mɛ miì rì ɓɛ̀soghàsogha; ɓɛ kpɔmdɛ̀ngà giɓ anɛ̀n lɛɛ̀gwey.
Nni Yeesus à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ: Càrina giɓ anɛ, ɓi kìki nyi fɔlɔɔ lɛ cɛ? À kìi syeesyee à kìɓan ɓisu wɛ̀m.
Lɛ ɓì rì rì ɓɛ̀soghàsogha ɓyààmɛ̀n ɓìcèm, ɓì ki rì lɛ ɓì kì ɓɔ kìrɔɔ cààmɛ̀n kìcèm ki ɓì kɔ̀ni, kìɓan kìfog mɛ̀ màa ɓa ɓi ri mìni cààmɛ̀n kìcèm.
Giɓ anɛ à kìi gàɓ ìnɛ ì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ rì nyi. À loogh mɛ̀ kì siŋii tirààre ɓi rìɓòm ɗi ɓɛ ri mɛ̀ ɓiì ɓòmi.
Ǹkalii mìni ɓi saaɗ lɛ, jàŋbimiɗ ìnɛ Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ à kaakàlɛɛ gɛ ɓi ziinɛ bimiɗ, ɓɛ kpaakpaa gɛ girig kìɓan ki giɓ anɛ à kìi ki, ɓɛ yiìyìtàg nyi miì.
Fɔɔnnɛ Zyudas Iskariyot, kìbog ki ɓi ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ Yeesus ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì ɓɛɓɛɛ̀, à kɛ̀ngà kì ghɛɛ̀ ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey lɛ a kaɓ ɓɔ Yeesus.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀roɓɛ̀n ɓɛ wokà fɔlɔɔ, ɓɛ nyaàrɛ̀n lɛɛ̀gwey, ɓɛ ki kàg nyi lɛ, ɓɛ ri nyi ɓiì faà mɔ̀ɔ̀ni. Fɔɔnnɛ Zyudas à tumɛ̀ngà min rikaakàà ɗi kirɔŋiɗ ki lɛ a fa ɓɔ Yeesus.

Ŋwos a ǹtonto ànɛ ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ ɓɛ nkìlàg bìrɛs ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ foŋ nwìɗ miì, innɛ ɓɛ ŋweeyì jɔ̀ɔ̀ ì Paskà; ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ Yeesus ɓɛ tɔkà nyi lɛ: Fe nnɛ u kɔ̀nkɔn lɛ tì kɛǹ wɔ̀ kì pègsɛɛ ɓiɗilàg ɓi Paskà?
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à romgà ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛɓɛɛ̀, à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Kɛ̀ɛna ɓi bàn, ɓì ɓiì tuusɛɛ ri ŋwaàdɛŋ di à tɛ̀tɛɛgh bèè i mɛ̀nig, ɓi nɔɔ̀ti nyi,
naa ìnɛ à rì miì ɓiì ɗiŋii, ɗiŋiina girig wɔɔ, ɓi kpaà ŋwaàmɛɛ lɛ: Ǹɗèsàg lɛ kìden ki naa ki nyii ri ɓiì ɗii Paskà miì rì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii kiǹ ki ri fe yɔ?
À rì mìni ɓiì rèsii coo kìden ki naa ɓi mɛɛ aɗyoo, kì pègsɛn ri ɓyom ɓìcèm, wɔɔ nnɛ ɓì ɓiì pègsɛɛ ɓiɗilàg ɓi Paskà.
Nni ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ kɛngà ɓɛ kpaŋ ɓi bàn, ɓɛ tanɛ̀n ɓìɓan ɓìcèm lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à kpaaghà ɓɔ, ɓɛ pegsɛ̀n ɓìɗilàg ɓi Paskà wɔɔ.
Yɛ̀ɛ cɛnkò ki kpagà, Yeesus à yùy rì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì ɓɛɓɛɛ̀.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ kɔrìghà ɓi ɓìɗilàg, nni Yeesus à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ: Ǹkpaa mìni ɓi saaɗ lɛ, kìbog ki ɓi mìni ki kɛɛ̀ ɗiɗi nɗaŋ ri mɛ̀, ki ri mɛ̀ ɓiì kàɓi.
Nni ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ samgàkà, rì ànɛ̀n miì à tɔg nyi lɛ, mɛ̀ yɛɛ ri nya yɔ̀?
Yeesus à ɓàkà ɓɔ lɛ: Kìbog ki ɓi mìni ɓɛ kìntɛ̀ɗ rì ɓɛɓɛɛ̀, ki ti ɗiɗi taasà bog, rì kɔ kɛɛ̀ ri.
Man à mum à rì ɓiì wiì lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ kangà lɛ à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì wiì, kìɓan kìfog nyìighnyìg rì ŋwaànɛ à rì nyi ɓiì kàɓi, ki ɓaghà kìrɔɔ lɛ ŋwaànɛ̀n kɛ̀ɛ yalɛn.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ɗiɗìghà, nni Yeesus à tekà bìrɛs, à fa Bɛ̀ll ɓìtògsɛ̀n, à ɓɛg min yɔ̀, à fa rì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii, à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Terina, nyoo yɛ̀m yɛ̀ɛ ri lɛ̀.
Fɔɔnnɛ à teɗtìghà ɓeŋ, à fa ɓɛ̀yilàg di à mɛ ka fa Bɛ̀ll ɓìtògsɛ̀n, nni ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ nɔghà ɓeŋ ànɛ̀n ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm.
Yeesus à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Bwaɓ yɛm̀ yɛɛ ri lɛ, bwaɓ yi rìràrɛn ɗi lɛ rì Bɛ̀ll rì ɓum, yɛɛ ri ɓiì kpaŋì ɓisuu ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey.
Ǹkalii mìni ɓi saaɗ lɛ: Màa nɔti ɓi mɛrɔ̀g mɛ vìinyɛ̀ à kpaŋ ŋwos anɛ ǹnɔtii gɛ mɔ, nyɔɔnyɔn à rìnɔ, ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll.
